description: Finding homes for sale or apartments for rent has never been easier. Trulia’s top-rated real estate app instantly shows you a map of nearby homes for sale, open houses, or apartments for rent. With our simple-to-use filters, you can find real estate listings that match your specific search criteria. And with Trulia’s boards you can save, narrow, and share your favorite homes with friends, family, or by yourself to help in your home search. Easily browse basic real estate info, detailed housing listings, and open houses for homes for sale or homes for rent. Plus, quickly compare properties with vivid full-screen photos of homes and rentals, get real-time notifications about properties you've saved, receive instant alerts when new homes nearby hit the market, and gather local neighborhood info. Now optimized for your tablet and Android Wear, the Trulia Real Estate & Rentals App lets you keep up with your house hunt wherever you go. “One of the best Android apps for finding a house to buy, place to rent or to simply browse local real estate information." – Best Android Apps Review Stay on top of your real estate home search with the Trulia. Note: Trulia Real Estate & Rentals only provides housing listings in the US at this time. Key Features: ✓ NEW! Boards: the simple way to organize, narrow, and share your favorite homes. ✓ NEW! Voice Search: You can now ask Google to search for homes on Trulia using nothing but your voice. ✓ Instant Maps: Using built-in GPS, see nearby homes for sale, houses for rent, apartments for rent, or recently sold homes. ✓ Nearby Home Alerts: Get instantly alerted when homes near your current location hit the market. ✓ Android Wear Compatibility: Get nearby home alerts, view property details and photos, or contact the realtor — all from your watch. ✓ Open Houses: Find open houses for sale near you, and easily add them to your calendar. ✓ Custom Searches: Filter your search by price, lot size, number of bedrooms and bathrooms, neighborhood, and more. ✓ Keyword Searches: Search for listings using keywords or MLS numbers. ✓ Photo slideshows: View slideshows of homes, condos, townhomes, apartments and more. ✓ Instant Updates: Get notified immediately when new home listings come up in your favorite areas or there are updates to your saved homes. ✓ Local Scoop: See school ratings and nearby amenities like restaurants, grocery stores, gas stations, and more. ✓ Crime Maps: See a crime map of any neighborhood in the US. ✓ Map Modes: View a map area in normal, satellite or terrain mode. ✓ Mortgage Calculator: Get personalized rates and calculate your mortgage. ✓ Affordability Breakdown: Calculate the full cost of owning your dream home, including mortgage, homeowner’s insurance, and property taxes. ✓ Cross-device Access: Log in to access your favorite searches and properties across all your devices. ✓ Connect w/Realtors: Quickly contact relevant real estate agents about listings. ✓ Directions: Get directions to open houses, homes for sale, or apartments for rent. ✓ Trulia Widget: See new homes for sale, right from your home screen. ✓ Samsung Air View: Hover your finger - or S-pen - on a property listing to see property details (only available on Samsung GALAXY Note I, Note II, Note 8.0 and 10.1, and Samsung GALAXY S4). We'd love to hear your feedback! Email us anytime: android@trulia.com
release_text: With this release, you’ll be able to browse through curated collections of homes, making it even easier to discover the right house for you. We’re also giving you more control of your boards, allowing you to delete them, remove people from boards, or leave the ones you’ve joined. Tip: Trulia will keep you in the know when new homes come on the market that meet your criteria. Save a search to get started. Keep the feedback coming! Email us anytime at android@trulia.com.

description: Ever wondered why your car consumes more fuel from time to time? Or how the way you drive can affect fuel economy? So many tips and tricks can help you improve gas millage (fuel consumption), but you don't need to worry about them with us. You just need to follow one simple rule: TURN RED BARS TO GREEN TO SAVE FUEL. ► Requirements: 1. OBD II reader, connected to your car. 2. Torque Pro app, pre installed on your android device. This plugin only works together with Torque Pro app. ► Available Units: MPG, Imperial MPG, L/100KM, Km/L ► Notes: 1. App starts showing graphs a few seconds after your vehicle starts moving. 2. Three methods are embedded in the app to calculate mileage/fuel consumption. Try to change the method if it doesn't respond or the numbers are inaccurate. It is common for some vehicles to report slightly different numbers on different methods. Some cars might not support one or two method at all. 3. Set "Fuel Type", "Engine Displacement" and "Volumetric Efficiency" in your car profile. 4. On devices without menu button, touch anywhere on the screen and hold for 2 seconds. Menu pops up. ✮ Polite Note ✮ In case you have encountered a problem please kindly contact us first, before give us a low rate. tags: gas mileage, MPG, L/100KM, KML, Imperial MPG, fuel economy, OBD II, fuel consumption, for Torque Pro, Mileage, ECU, mpg, Torque Lite, hypermiling

Medical Digital Ray Personal Healthcare Record (PHR), he is Healthcare Record that can be used by any patient to record and store its medical measures such as the blood pressure measures, the blood glucose measures and to store also the measures of its vital signs. The Personal Healthcare Record keeps the history of the registered measures in order to allow the patient to track and supervise its medical history online, anywhere and anytime. For patients who are registered in DR Clinical information system, PHR provides a complete summary of previous prescriptions, laboratory test results and radiology reports and gives the possibility to book new appointment to a specific doctor, date and time. PHR consists of 7 crucial parts: 1- Home: The PHR home page provides reports that allow patient to supervise her/his Blood Pressure, Blood Glucose, Heart rate and Temperature. 2- Registration: In order to use the PHR system, patient shall register and providing her/his personal information data. 3- Vital Signs: In this page, patient is able to enter, edit or monitor her/his vital signs (Blood Pressure, Blood Glucose, Heart rate and Temperature). 4-Appointement: The patient can book new appointment and view its previous appointment. 5-Prescription: All details of patient prescriptions history are accessible via this page. 6-Laboratory: All details of patient laboratory test results history are accessible via this page. 7-Radiology: All details of patient Radiology reports history are accessible via this page.

Антон Павлович Чехов — русский писатель, общепризнанный классик мировой литературы. По профессии врач. Почётный академик Императорской Академии наук по Разряду изящной словесности. Один из самых известных драматургов мира. Основные возможности: - Приложение включает в себя практически все сочинения Чехова. - Настройка отображения: светлая/темная тема, ночной режим - Настройка размера шрифта - Быстрая публикация произведения в Facebook, Google+, Вконтакте, Gmail, Twitter, SMS. - Произведения известных отечественных и зарубежных писателей в одном приложении. Для загрузки текстов произведений используется Интернет-соединение. Anton Chekhov - Russian writer, a recognized classic of world literature. Doctor by profession. Honorary Academician of the Imperial Academy of Sciences in belles-lettres. One of the most famous playwrights in the world. Key features: - The application includes almost all the works of Chekhov. - Setting the display: light / dark theme, night mode - Adjust the font size - Rapid publication of works in Facebook, Google+, FaceBook, Gmail, Twitter, SMS. - Works of famous domestic and foreign writers in a single application. To download the texts of works using the Internet connection.

Psychopharmacology Update features a licensed and Board Certified Psychiatric Pharmacist (BCPP) presenting an in-depth review over psychiatric medications that have recently been FDA approved. This presentation incorporates an audio-synced slide deck with easy to use functionality to improve the learning experience. This is a scholarly presentation that contains unbiased medication information (NO pharmaceutical sponsorship). PRESENTATION OBJECTIVES: Schizophrenia - describe how antipsychotics work on the pathophysiology of schizophrenia to improve core symptoms - identify the basic dopamine pathways and their relationship with efficacy versus side effects - discuss a unique treatment option for antipsychotic-induced hyperprolactinemia - examine pharmacological characteristics of both 1st and 2nd generation antipsychotics - discuss differences between the newer antipsychotics - compare the mean increase in QTc prolongation for individual antipsychotics - review treatment goals, guidelines for selection, and monitoring Depression - discuss unique pharmacological characteristics of vilazodone (Viibryd™) and vortioxetine (Brintellix™) - review medication selection - examine potential receptor targets - describe the mechanism of antidepressant-induced sexual dysfunction MEDICATIONS REVIEWED: Long-Acting Injectable Second Generation Antipsychotics - aripiprazole monohydrate (Abilify Maintena™) - olanzapine pamoate (Zyprexa® Relprevv™) - paliperidone palmitate (Invega® Sustenna®) - risperidone long-acting injectable (Risperdal® Consta®) Second Generation Antipsychotic Oral Formulations - iloperidone (Fanapt®) - asenapine (Saphris®) - lurasidone (Latuda®) First Generation Antipsychotic Inhalation Powder - loxapine inhalation powder (Adasuve®) Antidepressants - vilazodone (Viibryd™) - vortioxetine (Brintellix™) All aboard! Come take a journey through the wonderful world of psychopharmacology!!! Recommended by Appgovideo.com ( http://www.appgovideo.com/ )

description: Big Fish is pleased to announce that Fairway Solitaire™ is back, and it's bigger and better than ever! One of the most exciting and addictive card games available includes solitaire hands dealt on more than 408 hand-crafted golf holes, 4 mini games, 37 trophies, a golf shop, golf announcers, hazard cards, and one SERIOUSLY ticked off gopher! "… an incredibly awesome puzzle game masquerading as solitaire." - Penny Arcade "It might look like a straightforward card game on the surface but there's much more to Fairway Solitaire thanks to its assured, inventive design. It's a hugely enjoyable, supremely polished strategic deck shuffler that should suit puzzle fans to a tee." PocketGamer: 8/10 Follow this hilariously sarcastic story of the gopher and his seething disdain and desire to put all golfers in their place! From beachside courses where palm trees sway, to the hustle and bustle of illuminated city courses, keep your eye on the prize because there is nowhere this gopher won’t follow. Score the best runs by clearing the card deck using the least amount of moves, and don’t forget about those mulligans! Whether scoring a double bogey or 3 under par, this hit will have you laughing so loud you’ll forget to be quiet on the golf course! TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! ☆☆☆☆☆ Features ☆☆☆☆☆ ✓ Bright scenery and captivating artwork bring the classic to life! ✓ Delightful commentary and appealing sounds enhance game play ✓ Fill up your golf meter to earn helpful golf bucks ✓ Find Iron cards on the green to add to your golf bag ✓ Watch out for water, wedge, and rough cards that test your skills! ✓ Use your golf bucks for one iron, or fill your entire bag! ✓ Wild Shot cards can either make or break a terrific golf game! ☆☆☆ Discover more from Big Fish Games! ☆☆☆ Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere — on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. Learn more at bigfishgames.com! We have many other great Google Play games available. Just type in 'Big Fish Games' for more fun and adventure!

description: ********** As Featured on: Lifehacker: http://lifehacker.com/sms-wakeup-shows-your-texts-on-screen-when-you-receive-1277264011 Droidaphile: http://droidaphile.com/sms-wakeup-it-is-the-small-apps-that-make-life-all-the-better/ AndroidOfVIrtue: http://www.androidofvirtue.com/sms-wakeup-gets-updated-and-brings-with-it-hangouts-intergration-app-update/ WonderHowTo: http://htc-one.wonderhowto.com/how-to/make-your-htc-ones-screen-turn-when-receiving-new-text-messages-0148488/ ********** Annoyed that your phone doesn't light up when you receive a text? Just install this nifty little app! This tiny little program runs in the background and awakes your phone for a few seconds to alert you of a new text message. Completely no frills, no ads, and no annoying pop-ups! (Pop-ups now optional. Pro version lets you view the text message in native app with 1 click) Now works with Hangouts, GO SMS, Handcent, and other 3rd party clients! If you are having trouble getting it to work with these clients, try uninstalling and re-installing THAT app (NOT THIS ONE). The way android handles notification priorities is based on which app was installed first. I apologize for the inconvenience, but there is nothing I can do on my end. If you like the app, download the pro version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dberm22.SMSWakeUpPro More pop-up settings, messaging shortcut, no donate message, and a sense of pride for helping out a struggling small-time dev. I am also currently working on getting it to work with email and gchat. If you have any suggestions for features, feel free to email me at dberm22@gmail.com .

description: Mobile Alarm System is a burglar alarm system with many features. It protects your phone from theft and nosey people or can also be used simply as a prank. Besides sounding an alarm it can also silently take a picture, send an SMS or email, or call someone. Like this, it can be used in many ways: ★ to find out who is using your phone ★ to get informed when your parents get home early ★ to count how many times someone goes into your room when you're out ★ as a babyphone ★ ... An alarm can be triggered when: - the phone is moved (only in the pro version) - something approaches or leaves the proximity sensor - the phone is unplugged from charger - someone unlocks the phone - a noise is too loud - the camera detects motion (only in the pro version) ★ The proximity sensor can detect when something that lies on your phone is removed! The alarm system can be used as a warning against theft and burglary or just as a prank. The surveillance with the mobile alarm system brings protection and security for your phone. --- FEATURES --- - 4 different sensors (6 in the pro version) - 8 different sounds - Take a picture when the alarm is triggered - Beautiful design - PIN Lock (only in the pro version) - Duration of the alarm can be changed - Sensitivities of the different sensors can be changed - Alarm siren can be delayed so that the alarm can be cancelled in advance (if the user can unlock the phone) - precise noise detection - Camera preview (only in the pro version) - Send e-mail with picture, sms or make a call when the alarm is triggered (only in the pro version) This app can not be used like Lookout Security & Antivirus as an antivirus software or to find a lost phone. It rather protects your phone against intruders, stalkers, children etc. The permission READ_PHONE_STATE is needed to prevent the alert from being triggered while someone is calling you.
release_text: Spanish translation thanks to Pau Galindo

description: Note: a 10-15MB content download will be required the first time the application starts. Bring Canada's national historic sites and the best of Canadian heritage cooking into your home with the Parks Canada Heritage Gourmet food app. Embark on a culinary journey through Canada’s rich history and across Canada’s vast territory by trying out the recipes – which have been updated for modern cooks - and reading the stories in this app. Aussi disponible en français. * Choose from over 70 recipes, each with a stunning photograph of the finished dish. * Browse recipes from the 18th century to today, representing all of Canada's regions. * Enjoy traditional recipes that have been chef-tested and modified for today's cooks, with both imperial and metric measures. * Search or browse by ingredient, course, menu, period or region. * The app is self-contained - no internet connection is required after the initial download and periodic updates. Save recipes to your personal recipe collection. * Add ingredients to your Shopping List to bring with you to the grocery store. * Share recipes with friends and family using email, Facebook and Twitter. * Cook traditional favourites like Acadan Bouilli, West Coast Finnan Haddie and Newfoundland’s Jiggs Dinner. * Enjoy national historic site tried-and-true favourites like the Fortress of Louisbourg’s French Soldier's Bread, Woodside’s Marmalade or Lower Fort Garry's famous Corn Bread * Try out recipes like Bannock, Luski and Sourdough Flapjacks that were originally cooked over an outdoor fire. * Cook an entire meal using one of the menus. * Learn a story about each recipe - tell your dinner guests or family which notable Canadian enjoyed a particular dish, how a dish got its name or which 18th century cookbook a recipe first came from. * Watch a behind-the-scenes video of the chefs and photographers at work. * See a video of chefs creating an 18th century dessert using today's ingredients. * Find out about the national historic site of Canada that submitted the recipe and start to plan your next culinary adventure.
release_text: Now optimized for tablets. Share recipes using Facebook and Twitter.

description: Do you want to keep using your device while watching movies ? Stick it! is the way to go! Enjoy the desktop experience on your Android device! Stick it! is the only video player of its kind : it can live on top of your screen, above any of your other applications and allow you to use your device’s other features (browsing, emailing, texting...) while watching your favorite movie! Impress your friends with the MultiView™ feature ! !!! WATCH THE VIDEO !!! Like your desktop player, you can move, resize and even minimize Stick it! in the system tray, background playing is supported. As we love geeks, Stick it! comes with some predefined themes like Windows 7 or Mac OSX (more to come). Moreover, Stick it! supports the following network protocols : MMS RTSP (RTP, SDP) HTTP progressive streaming and HTTP live streaming (M3U8). ● Features: ☆ MultiView™ : watch multiple movies simultaneously ! ☆ Truly floating player : move, resize and minimize supported ☆ Background playing ☆ Supports most video formats ☆ Streaming support (MMS, RTSP, HTTP) ☆ Built-in themes (Windows 7, Mac OSX, more to come) ☆ Built-in file browser Feel free to report any bugs, our main goal is customer satisfaction. ● Permissions explained : - READ_PHONE_STATE : to minimize windows on incoming calls - INTERNET : for http/rtsp streaming - ACCESS_WIFI_STATE : to estimate bandwidth for buffering
release_text: !!! SEE OVERSKREEN : FLOATING BROWSER !!! 1.7.x : Overskreen theme, bug fixes 1.6.x : IMPROVED YouTube support 1.5.0 : MAJOR REWRITE - Background playing - Added seek bar for RWD/FWD - Enqueue support (if MultiView is disabled) - fixed some UI glitches

description: We are on Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=252915248 AppsZoom 11/06/13 “A fresh breeze of air in a foul and barren genre as are CCGs.” 148Apps 11/06/13 “Between a varied set of cards, the hand-drawn art style, and neat battle system, there’s a lot to like about Decromancer” Super Game Droid 11/06/13 “The games gorgeous hand-drawn graphics, a truly captivating storyline, and a highly addictive style of gameplay make Decromancer an absolute must download.” What would happen if all species were as intelligent as humanity? Find out in Decromancer, the tactical battle card game that puts you at the core of a whirlwind adventure across an epic single player campaign! Help a friendly Diplomat return to her people by battling your way through enemy territory. Build your deck and find the best formation to earn yourself victory in these troubling times. ▶ Command an army of hand-painted cards, each with their own tactical advantages and special abilities. ▶ Explore a large, beautifully illustrated open world. ▶ Outmaneuver your opponents in deep turn-based combat, requiring forethought and strategy. ▶ Cast powerful spells to turn the tide of battle. ▶ Unlock new cards as you progress to supplement and improve your army. Follow us on: Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheDecromancer Tumblr: http://decromancer.tumblr.com/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Decromancer
release_text: - Bug Fix: General Kuo'Cyuf battle no longer respawns when the game is opened. - The final chapter of the story is now complete! - Lots of new cards added. - Elite spells added. - Four new bosses - The Buzzsaw, The Reaper, The Hydra and The Oculi Queen - Total rebalance of card prices, gold dropped and Elite points required to upgrade cards. - Rebalanced many of the existing cards.

There are many grocery apps in the app store, so whate makes our app different? Why should you use it? Our Grocery Organizer lets you: - quickly setup daily shopping lists. - transfer lists by bluetooth between members of the family who also own the app. - edit products' name picture and measurement, so they describe more accurately what you actually want to buy. - add new products if the ones you want are not present in the app. - start a "buy session", so you can check all the stuff that is already bought and know what else is left to buy. If some one like translate application labels in his own language, s/he is welcome. Just send e-mail to our support e-mail, we will send you the instructions and XLS file with all labels In the upcoming updates you will be able to send lists wherever your partner is via internet. He or she will be also sent push notification so even if their app is not running they will know they have a new list to do.

About Smart SWF Player: It is a tool application to play flash file(.swf) stored locally on the device (including sd-card).with it,to play and run swf files is now possible and easy.If you like flash animations,games,apps you will need it! Key features: ✓Can play flash animations ✓Can play flash games ✓Can play flash apps ✓Support play control ✓Support landscape full-screen mode ✓Support portrait full-screen mode ✓Very small program size Installation: You need to install Adobe Flash Player Plugin before using this player. Popular Installed Device: LG Optimus 2X LG Revolution HTC Desire HTC Incredible HTC Inspire HTC ThunderBolt HTC Sensation HTC Evo 4G HTC Dragon Moto Droid X Moto Droid X2 Moto Milestone Moto Defy Moto Atrix Samsung Epic Samsung Galaxy Tab Samsung Galaxy S2 Sony Ericsson Xperia Nexus S Samsung Epic 4G Moto XT800 Moto Xoom Acer Liquid Acer Stream Dell Venue SHARP IS03/05 SHARP SH-12C Bug Report: If you have any request or you want to notify a bug, contact me using e-mail( andy.bian.developer@gmail.com ). #FAQ Q - Why not work? A - Please check do you install adobe flash player plugin after that kill smart flash player task and restart it. Q - How to install adobe flash player plugin? A - You can download adobe flash player plugin on android market (https://market.android.com/details?id=com.adobe.flashplayer). But not all android2.2 device can meet the minimum hardware requirements for adobe flash player plugin . Good Luck ! Q - What is SWF file? A - SWF is one of the most popular Flash container formats and it's used for most of the animated content and video clips on today's websites. Q - How to use? A - You can download flash files(.swf) from internet and copy to sd-card. Play them with this tool. Q - Why does need Internet and Phone state permissions? A - The Internet and Phone state permissions are only used to show ads. The paid version is on sale right now. It's called "Smart SWF Player Pro" Thank you very much for your support! #KW Flash,Flash Player,Adobe Flash File Player,SWF File Player,Flash Game Player,Flash Online Game Player

Save time doing dictionary lookups! Simply point your camera at some Chinese text to get all the English definitions. And everything works offline . Within just a couple of seconds of launching this Chinese OCR app, and without even touching the screen, you can be viewing word-by-word definitions of a complete line of Chinese text. The auto-snapshot feature means you won't have to keep awkwardly trying to position your camera. Please Note: * Works with both our Mandarin (Hanping Chinese Dictionary, free & paid apps) and Cantonese (Hanping Cantonese Dictionary, paid app only) dictionary apps * Designed for reading regular Chinese text (like in a book). It is not intended for reading things like shop signs, food labels or other images using stylized text, so please bear this in mind before purchasing. * Works much better on text printed on paper than on text on computer screens. However, works really well on screenshots * Designed for students learning Mandarin Chinese. Some Cantonese characters may not be recognized * Having trouble focusing the camera ? Try holding it further away from the text * Details on how to get this paid app (living in China? ): http://goo.gl/YGonR If you encounter ANY problems (e.g. stretched or rotated live preview) please contact us at hanping@embermitre.com and we will do our very best to fix it. We have done lots of testing on many different devices but there may be some problematic camera drivers we have not yet come across. If you're not satisfied, for any reason, within 30 days you get a full refund , period, no questions asked. We don't want your money if you're not amazingly happy. Simply send us an email. Features: ★ Scans live camera preview as well as still images (such as photos and screenshots ) ★ Works entirely offline ! (INTERNET permission is only for dictionary updates etc) ★ Simplified and Traditional characters ★ Recognizes over 8000 different characters ★ Pinyin and Zhuyin (Bopomofo) pronunciation ★ Horizontal & vertical text ★ Fast - perform recognition in a fraction of a second ★ Optimized for pages of regular text (such as in a book ) ★ Clear, regular fonts should work well in general, but you may need to use the controls to reframe the text ★ Recognized Chinese characters are drawn over the image, allowing you to easily verify accuracy ★ Each character is colored according to its tone ★ Breaks text down into words, displaying all corresponding dictionary entries ★ Supports pan, zoom, and pinch-to-zoom ★ Resizeable image window ★ Seamlessly integrates with Hanping Chinese Dictionary (which you will need to install - it's free! - to see the dictionary entries) and Hanping Cantonese Dictionary (paid app) There are two View modes: 1. Live View The screen shows the live camera preview and the app continuously scans it for Chinese. As words are recognized, the corresponding dictionary entries are displayed. Live View has two sub-modes: a) Auto : the camera is continuously refocused and a snapshot is automatically taken as soon as the characters are recognized. b) Manual : you control when to focus and whether to use flash (if your device supports it). You also choose when to snapshot the preview image. 2. Image View Works with still images which are either snapshots of the camera preview or existing images (e.g. photos) you already have on your Android device. Please use the forum (see below) to report any bugs or suggestions. Blog : http://hanpingchinese.com/blog Forum : http://hanpingchinese.com/forum Facebook : http://facebook.com/hanpingchinese Google+ : http://google.com/+HanpingChinese Twitter : http://twitter.com/hanpingchinese
release_text: ★ New app icon ★ Some bug fixes Note: for vertical text mode: Show Direction in overflow menu PLEASE: email us at hanpingchinese@embermitre.com if you find a bug and we will get it fixed as soon as possible. Thanks very much for your support.

description: Mahjong GoLink , the best Link Up Game ! Funny brain puzzle game, Nice UI and animation, Easy operation, 4 Game Mode, Special DIY Game Mode, more than 20 levels, 4 magic props, 24 lovely Mahjong icons and the secret trophies. Mahjong GoLink Game also is the classic kid's board game, a link game to improve memory skills for kids. It's fun , it also can help kids to identify these common Mahjong signs. Tips: * Use 'U/Z' lines to remove all pairs of identical icons. * The move ways are different for each level, You will need to link differently for different levels. * Get more Stars in each level to unlock the hidden level. * Special DIY Game Mode, You can play with your own letters . * More than five chain hits will create a props. * 4 magic props: Add your bonus , time, hint, and reset times . * TIME LIMIT for each level, so keep link ! * Zodiac GoLink can bring you lots of fun, and also train your reactivity ability ! Go and have a challenge! About Mahjong: Mahjong is a game that originated in China, commonly played by four players . Similar to the Western card game rummy, mahjong is a game of skill, strategy and calculation and involves a certain degree of chance.

Are you commuting on Perth public transport? Then TripMate Perth is your ideal companion. TripMate Perth is a powerful offline timetable app which provides fast timetable access for Transperth, Trans Busselton, Trans Geraldton & Bunbury City. BUSES, TRAINS & FERRY. With TripMate in your pocket you have access to Perth's transit information anywhere and anytime. Unlike other transit applications you do not need network access to check your timetable information. This means you get results fast. TripMate makes your commute easy with a variety of benefits: * TripMate works anytime and anywhere. No data network connection required. * Immediately find the next departure for your Stop. By Route, by Stop name or from your saved Favourites. * Save your favourite Routes & Stops for convenient access. * Check your SmartRider balance * Use predictive search from the action bar on the top of the app to quickly find your Route or Stop. * View next Departures for any transit Stop or Station in Perth. * View Trip details. * View the Stops for your Trip on the map. * All the timetable information is stored on your phone. * TripMate informs you when updated timetable information is available for download from the 'More' screen. Don't worry, TripMate has the tiniest timetable files among all other transit apps out there. This saves you both bandwidth and storage space on your device. Check your notifications bar to download the most up-to-date timetable available. * Note: all times displayed are local Perth times. Get access to fast timetable information and download TripMate Perth today! For any feedback or bugs please contact us via our website ( http://www.tripmate.info/contact ) or like us on Facebook ( http://facebook.com/tripmateapp ).
release_text: * Update for timetable download issue * Miscellaneous improvements

Razer Comms is a free all-in-one communications solution for gamers, offering crystal clear VoIP and versatile instant messaging with group chat capabilities. Built with advanced in-game overlay functionality and cross-game chat support, Razer Comms allows you to get in touch with your friends without compromising your gameplay. This is how gamers were meant to communicate. Features: • Connecting Gamers – Connect with your friends or find new gamers on the world’s largest multi-platform gaming messenger. • Instant Messaging - Chat away with your friends 1on1 or in groups. • Free Voice Chat – Make your voice heard with friends on mobile and PC alike. • No Interruptions – The in-app overlay allows you to handle messages and calls without interrupting what you’re currently doing. • Stay in the game - SMS-Forwarding and Call Notifications on the PC allow you to stay connected even while you’re in-game. • Multi-Platform (PC, Tablet or Phone) – No matter your preference. Comms is there. • Always On – Never miss a message and instantly receive them with push notifications. • Completely Free – Razer Comms doesn’t have any hidden costs. Works over your phone's existing data plan or any WiFi connection.

description: This is a plugin for the Sony Ericsson LiveView MN800 device and Torque - it allows you to display gauges from the Torque Pro OBD application on the remote display, so you can have a small digital (or gauge) readout on a separate location of your car Imagine being able to keep your phone in your pocket and still be able to see a digital boost gauge readout on the LiveView display, or any other OBD2 sensor that Torque can read. The plugins display will even match the graphical theme you have selected in Torque itself! Now supports HUD mode (heads up display) mode, so you can put the LiveView device on the dashboard and see it reflected in the windscreen at night! The 'LiveView' device is a little 'remote display'. You can find them on sites like ebay and they're not too expensive. Please note: This plugin needs a handset which can handle multiple bluetooth concurrent connections in a reliable manner. Not all handsets are able to do this due to various bluetooth driver bugs so some phones may be a little troublesome to setup. The LiveView devices can also be a little 'temperamental' at times so make sure you have the latest firmware update from it (available on the sonyericsson site)
release_text: * Added HUD mode (for night viewing) * Couple of bugfixes There is a firmware update available for the LiveView device on the sony ericsson support website which fixes some stability issues with the device.

description: Use flashcards, multiple-choice quiz and true/false quiz questions to prepare for the Personal Trainer Certification exams offered by National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM) and American Council on Exercise (ACE). With eleven modules ranging from exercise programs to ethical issues learn the key information for the certification exam. Includes more than 650 multiple choice quiz questions, flashcards (now with images). Plus glossary with common terms and definitions for eleven learning modules. Built-in Learning Modules: Module 1: Exercise Programming Module 2: Directional Terms Module 3: Advanced Skeletal Anatomy Module 4: Advanced Muscle Anatomy Module 5: Exercise Methods Module 6: Health Appraisal and Fitness Testing Module 7: Medical Considerations Module 8: Nutrition and Fitness Module 9: Safety Module 10: Client Relations Module 11: Ethical Considerations Save and review flashcards, track your score and save to the leader board. In addition, create customer flashcards and share them with the community of users. - Create your own flashcards, multiple-choice and glossary - Send multiple-choice quiz questions to friends - Post score for global ranking - Keep up to date with latest news and articles with the Personal Trainer news Keywords: Fitness Professional, Fitness Exam, Fitness Exam, Performance Enhancement Specialist, ACE exam, workout, exercise, diet plan, nutrition plan, diet and exercise, weight training, athletic training, wellness specialist, nutrition specialist, CPT,
release_text: - Improved Interface; New look and feel - New flashcard save and review feature - Multiple-choice quiz timer - New True/False quiz capabilities - Track and post score to leader board

description: Fancy Pink Keyboard GO Keyboard Theme is a theme That You absolutely want to have ! Never before have you used a keyboard like this! Here are the main reasons why : * We have a theme menu! It's very easy to apply this theme . You simply OPEN the application and click on 'Set Active Theme " . description: "Lost Oddies is a clever little puzzle game that’s sure to drive players mad, but in a good way. It can turn calm, rational people into obsessed gamiacs who “must… solve… puzzle.” " - Stacy Barnes (148apps.com) - (4,5 - 5 stars) Help the Oddies get home by puzzling them towards their symbol. But be aware, Oddies of the same color will always follow one another! If you move one green Oddie to the left, all other green Oddies will also move to the left! This makes Lost Oddies a simple, yet brain twisting puzzle with 6 different Oddie behaviors and many interactive elements to use! Features: ● PLAY ALL LEVELS FOR FREE! ● 96 levels and more to come! ● 6 Unique Oddie behaviors ● Easy to learn, but difficult to master ● Many interactive elements, like “Transporter” and “Color changer” ● A real puzzle challenge for all ages Already a fan? Then connect with the Oddies! * Like us: http://facebook.com/lostoddies * Follow us: http://twitter.com/lostoddies * Plus: https://plus.google.com/114306144786990252634 Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LQ05pl81N7g

description: Filipino <> English Dictionary , Both Filipino ( Tagalog ) to English and English to Filipino ( Tagalog ) 100 % offline and free . You can search both English and Filipino words. You can search words directly from “Internet Browser” or other Applications by Sharing option. In sharing option you will find “Filipino Dictionary” and choosing “Filipino Dictionary” will open the dictionary with the shared word so you need not type and exiting from dictionary will return you to “Internet Browser” or other Applications again. This is not only a Dictionary but also a learning tool. You can use this dictionary when you have no internet connection. MCQ (Multiple Choice Question) option available. There is auto suggestion so you need not type full words. You also can use Speech to text feature . You can add words to study plan. And also you can remove words from study plan. You can turn on/off auto search going to setting of the app. So low profile Mobile handset can turn off Auto search to type quickly. You will see Dictionary icon on notification bar to start app quickly. On sharing text you will find Filipino Dictionary. This will be helpful to find out meaning of any word. • No internet connection required • Filipino ( Tagalog ) To English • English To Filipino ( Tagalog ) • Search From Web • Search by Sharing • Auto Suggestion • Pronounce & Voice Search • Antonyms (Opposite words) • Synonyms • Backup and Restore • History & Study Plan • Word Game • Share Words • Copy Words
release_text: • Voice search bug fixed • Word of the day added (Up to 5 words in a day) • Antonyms added • You can remove Banner Ad to get full screen for content by choosing Ad type. • Now you can backup study plan, history and added words in a file and restore on any device using that file. • New background added • More words added • After copying you can open dictionary directly (You can turn on/off this opting going to settings of the dictionary)

JDD à la Une : l’essentiel de l’info, l’actualité en continu sur votre mobile, le réflexe JDD ! Une application servicielle proposant les dernières news, la Une du Journal du Dimanche et la carte des points de vente les plus proches de vous Les + : la géolocalisation pour trouver le JDD où que vous soyez, la possibilité de partager les articles (réseaux sociaux, emails…), un lien vers le journal sur Newsstand et la possibilité de nous contacter, que vous soyez lecteur ou diffuseur de presse JDD Focus: most of the info, ongoing news on your mobile, the reflex JDD! A service-based application that provides the latest news, the Journal du Dimanche A map and points closest you sale Pros: geolocation to find the JDD anywhere, the ability to share items (social networks, emails ...), a link to the newspaper Newsstand and the ability to contact us, whether you drive or diffuser Press

app_name: Half Life Style Holo Icon pack
description: Half Life Style Edition! Una app tutta italiana!! Aiutateci a svilupparla con commenti e feedback! Half Life Style Holo è un tema per i più diffusi launcher Android fra i quali: - Apex Launcher - Nova Launcher - Adw Launcher ex - Smart Launcher - Holo Launcher Half Life Style Holo è un tema composto da: set di icone, sfondo, interfaccia e font per i caratteri; Sono integrate tutte le applicazioni di sistema, quelle maggiormente scaricate e tutti i social network! Half Life Style Holo è pensato per integrare alla perfezione le icone con l'interfaccia Holo di Android a partire dalla versione Ice Cream Sandwich 4.0.1. Infatti le icone non sono semplicemente colorate, sono interamente riprogettate per offrire un aspetto uniforme al vostro dispositivo! All'interno di Half Life Style Holo è previsto un particolare algoritmo che consente di uniformare anche le icone non previste nel tema, in questo modo il feeling Blue Holo è garantito anche per le applicazioni meno comuni! Tutta l'interfaccia grafica di Half Life Style Holo è stata realizzata con particolari tecniche grafiche finalizzate ad ottenere precisione e definizione massimizzate sia sui dispositivi di fascia alta che su quelli di fascia più bassa, con un particolare occhio di riguardo allo spazio di archiviazione! Il tema funziona con tutte le risoluzioni e tutti i formati di dispositivi! Per i dispositivi con versioni di Android inferiori alla 4.0, suggeriamo l'utilizzo di Holo Launcher per integrare il tema! Inoltre Half Life Style Holo NON integra al suo interno pubblicità di nessun tipo, non sono richieste autorizzazioni per l'app e nessun dato è richiesto da parte degli utenti! Con i prossimi aggiornamenti verrà ampliato il set di icone e verranno aggiunti ulteriori Launcher come Go e Launcher Pro! Se avete richieste su delle icone che non sono ancora state previste contattateci! Provvederemo al più presto! -------------------------------------------------------- Come abilitare Half Life Style Holo theme: - Nova Launcher -> impostazioni Nova Launcher -> Aspetto -> Tema Icone -> Hallween Orange Holo -> Ritornare a Nova Launcher -> vedrete le nuove icone - Apex Launcher -> aprire il cassetto delle app -> selezionare menu -> Impostazioni di Apex Launcher -> impostazione tema -> Half Life Style Holo -> è possibile osservare una anteprima del tema su Apex Launcher -> Applica -> tornare ad Apex Launcher -> vedrete le nuove icone - Holo Launcher ->aprire il cassetto delle app -> selezionare menu -> Impostazioni di Holo Launcher -> impostazioni aspetto-> Raccolta Icone -> Half Life Style Holo -> Applica -> tornare ad Holo Launcher -> vedrete le nuove icone - Smart Launcher -> toccare la scheda impostazioni di Smart Launcher -> menu -> preferenze Smart Launcher -> toccare il tasto impostazioni sulla riga "tema grafico" -> tema icone -> selezionare Half Life Style Holo -> tornare a Smart Launcher Half Life Style Edition! An all-Italian app! Help us to develop it with comments and feedback! Half Life Style Holo is a theme for the popular Android launcher including: - Apex Launcher - Nova Launcher - Adw Launcher Ex - Smart Launcher - Holo Launcher Half Life Style Holo is a theme consisting of: set of icons, background, interface and fonts for the characters; Integrates all system applications, the highest number of downloads and all the social networks! Half Life Style Holo is designed to integrate perfectly with the interface icons Holo Android from version 4.0.1 Ice Cream Sandwich. In fact, the icons are not just colorful, they are completely redesigned to provide a uniform appearance to your device! Within Half Life Style Holo has a unique algorithm which allows you to even out the icons provided in the theme, so the feeling Blue Holo is guaranteed even for the less common! All of the graphical interface of Half Life Style Holo was made with special graphic techniques aimed at obtaining precise definition and maximized on both high-end devices than on lower-end, with a particular focus on storage space! The theme works with all resolutions and all sizes of devices! For devices with Android versions lower than 4.0, we suggest the use of Holo Launcher to integrate the theme! In addition, Half Life Style Holo NOT integrates the advertising of any kind, no permissions are required for the app and no data is required by the users! With the next updates will be expanded set of icons will be added and more like Go Launcher and Launcher Pro! If you have any question about the icons that have not yet been provided, contact us! We will soon! -------------------------------------------------- ------ How to Enable Half Life Style Holo theme: - Nova Launcher -> Nova Launcher Settings -> Appearance -> Theme Icons -> Hallween Orange Holo -> Return to Nova Launcher -> you will see the new icons - Apex Launcher -> open the app drawer -> select Menu -> Settings Apex Launcher -> Theme settings -> Half Life Style Holo -> you can see a preview of the theme of Apex Launcher -> Apply -> go back to Apex Launcher -> you will see the new icons - Holo Launcher -> open the app drawer -> select Menu -> Settings Holo Launcher -> appearance settings-> Icons Collection -> Half Life Holo Style -> Apply -> return to Holo Launcher -> you will see the new icons   - Smart Launcher -> tap the settings tab of Smart Launcher -> menu -> Preferences Smart Launcher -> tap the settings button on the line "graphic theme" -> theme icon -> select Half Life Style Holo -> go back to Smart Launcher

"palmEM is an excellent, rapid point-of-care reference perfectly designed for the time crunch of the emergency department." -iMedicalApps.com Why buy an already outdated paper pocket reference that will become wrinkled, stained, misplaced and forgotten? For a fraction of the cost of even a basic printed guide, you'll never have to buy another quick reference. And you'll always be up-to-date. palmEM is an all-in-one, rapid and succinct, evidence based emergency medicine quick reference. Internal medicine, critical care, family practice and urgent care clinicians will also find palmEM useful. The app is continually updated and expanded. Unlike several other references, updates are free and there are no yearly subscription fees. REVIEWS: "Doc APProvED: The relentless search for an emergency medicine app that does it all will inevitably lead to palmEM...a great quick reference for the price." —Emergency Medicine News "There is so much in here I don’t know where to begin. It's Enchanted Baby Salon & Spa Playtime. Your kids will love this baby summer village game; It includes Baby Bath, Baby Salon, Baby Dressup & Baby Face Paint. This makeover and spa help is like magic spells for babies. With magical instruments and magic mirror, turn them into adorable babies. This adorable village is full of magic and fun! These enchanted babies want to look like fairies with your magic makeover spells and spa treatment. You have got a lot of enchanted tools for your makeover help. Enchanted baby spa & salon is a fun spa app to use magic makeover potion, perfume, enchanted tools and magic spells. Use baby oil and baby fashion accessories to make them look cute and pretty. It’s a baby dream house village! Bubble Bath Time and Enchanted Spa Treatment To make these sweetest babies shine and keep them pretty, you have to give them a bath first and use spa instruments. Use baby oil, shampoo and soaps to let them relax at the baby beauty parlor. These wonderheart babies love their bath. Cover them with shampoo, soap and tons of bubbles for a clean fun. Care-a-lot for these adorable little babies! Give your baby baths before and after playtime. The sweetest babies go to the bath to relax! With so many special facial tools, run your very own salon for babies. Baby Care & Dress Up Boutique Baby’s fashion resort is incomplete without an amazing selection of clothes from the village’s tiny boutique. Select a perfect baby outfit to go with the look from tons of cute clothing. Look for the dress up house in the map for a perfect baby outfit selection. Be the stylist of your dreams. Create amazing new looks, go wild with clothes and accessories, and design looks that suit these cute babies. Baby Face Paint Art Face paint makes these adorable babies prettier. Cheer up the kids with artistic masks. Let your kids use their fancy imaginations to create creative face paint art. Use rainbow colors to make face paint art in order to complete the look. Makeup Parlor Try on thousands of cosmetics colors, celebrity hairstyles and much more on the adorable baby. Enjoy being a virtual makeup artist of these cute little babies to make them look cute and pretty. Try on endless color combinations till you find a perfect color combination for the baby. FEATURES √ Colorful and user friendly to play √ All in 1! Bubble bath, Baby spa and dress up √ Visit different houses in the map of Enchanted Baby Spa & Salon √ Move to the next level once you are done with the magic makeover session √ Dozens of face masks and oils for a magical salon help √ Swipe through an amazing selection of face paint makeup √ Design your own amazing baby outfits Have fun playing the makeover and spa mini games with enchanted little babies. Play a messy but fun day at baby spa with cutest babies. WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK Parents and kids are our best reviewers. If you have a moment, feel free to rate and review our app. We'd also love to get your feedback to our email: support@hammerheadgame.com ABOUT Hammerhead Games Join our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/HammerheadGame Search “Hammerhead Games” on Google Play and discover more incredible apps for young kids. Hammerhead Games smart games provide an exciting, interactive, and rich educational experience. Filled with innovative and engaging activities, each application inspires creativity and imagination in a way that is uniquely enjoyable and stimulating. Let the games begin! description: Create and share plays. Ad supported - In-app donation to remove ads or buy the separate donate version = no ads, less Android permissions Description: Volleyball Dood is a must have application for volleyball coaches. A great clipboard or playbook application, it allows users to touch and move players around on a court and then layer on doodles and text. Once happy with the image, users can then save image. Saving a series of player positions can also be used to make animations that can be shared. Can be used on phone or tablet, buy once! Features: - quick play area transitions or use multitouch to position court - move players, add pylons, refs and a ball - save/share images & animations - add text and move it around - various doodles such as arrow line or dotted line Please email me for support or feature requests: info@sportsdood.com http://www.sportsdood.com/ (post images and animations to the user forum) Visit Sportsdood.com: - Training / How-to videos - Web-based animation viewer - Download Free Windows Video Maker sample: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=152ONnfy_WM&feature=youtu.be
release_text: New - fix corrupting formation database, may need to re-create formations, apologies for the inconvenience Previous - export formation / play databases so you can easily move entire playbooks between devices (tap clipboard icon) - double tap draw main icon to toggle ability to draw and move (also in options) - support custom backgrounds, put images in sdcard/volleyball dood/backgrounds (recommend 500w x 700h or higher same ratio) - ability to delete any frame (press '-' on the frame to remove)

description: **ATTENTION** Having trouble installing this doo-dad? Please read below. What is a doo-dad? A doo-dad is a widget that sole purpose is to add a little bling to your screen without having to change your background or theme. Do you have the perfect wallpaper or theme but it is missing some little something to set it off? That's where doo-dads come in. Doo-dads come in various sizes and put very little drain on your battery. To Install: 1. Purchase, download and install 2. Go to blank area on screen and long hold (press and hold) 3. When menu comes up select Widgets 4. Look for the doo-dad you installed and select it Your doo-dad should appear on the screen. If you would like to move it around just press and long hold until you see the doo-dad increase in size then move it to where you want it. Everybody's screen needs a doo-dad! Enjoy! keywords: ems, medical, doo-dads, doodads

Play書籍＆文献 有料トップ1位 ・Google Play書籍＆文献 売上トップ1位 ・Google Play書籍＆文献 新着有料トップ1位 【動作確認済メーカー別機種一覧】 ※130機種以上、Android5.0に対応 お客様の端末が、未確認機種の場合、動作が安定しない場合があります。お問い合わせ下さい。 http://shikaku.biglobe.ne.jp/app/wisdom_revised/index.html#os_support 　スマートフォンやタブレットにインストールしておけば、さっと使えて持ち運びも便利！ 通学・通勤のスキマ時間の学習に効果的！英会話やTOEIC、英検、大学受験の英語学習にぜひ！　 【概要】 　Amazonの英和辞典と和英辞典の各ランキング1位（3/31時点）！現代英語・語法に強い英語辞典の三省堂「ウィズダム英和辞典 第3版」（約10万2千項目）と「ウィズダム和英辞典 第2版」（約9万項目、約8万4千項目の用例）に約4万のネイティブ音声をセットにしたオフライン電子辞書アプリ。約15万の用例から的確な英語表現に出会えます。 　調べたい言葉を一字入力ごとに検索候補を絞り込む「インクリメンタルサーチ」、使い込む毎に自分だけの辞書に仕上げる「マーカーメモ」「ブックマーク」。4万超のネイティブ音声収録。 　辞書でありながら英語学習書として要となる語法欄をはじめ、派生語・語源・コロケーションも充実！ ****** 【学習応援！ビッグローブ辞書ご案内】 　人気の辞書を、iPhone・iPadで必要な分だけ 　これからは電子辞書よりスマホ辞書 　軽い＆コスパもいい http://manabi.biglobe.ne.jp/ 　「ビッグローブ辞書」で検索 ****** 【辞典アプリはこのような方にお薦め】 ・電子辞書として使いたい方 ・英検、TOEIC、大学受験の方 ・英単語、英熟語、英文法を調べる方 ・翻訳に従事する方 ・旅行英会話、ビジネス英会話を必要とする方 ・高校の授業、大学の講義を受講する方 日経トレンディ、エコノミストで紹介 【特長】 --- 【１】言葉の探究心を満たす検索＆音声再生 --- 　調べたい言葉を1文字入力するごとに検索候補を絞り込む「インクリメンタルサーチ」、「前方／後方／完全一致」、「見出し／成句／用例」など、英和と和英をスピーディーに一度で検索します。 ・約19万2千語の見出し語検索 ・約15万の用例検索 ・英文読解や文章作成時に成句・複合語検索 ・検索・表示履歴 ・アプリなら約4万項目のネイティブ音声 ・ビッグローブ製辞書アプリ間の検索に対応 ・Google音声検索 --- 【２】見やすく読みやすく美しい辞書ページ --- 文字サイズ、明度も調整可能♪　辞書ページの余白、行間にも配慮した高度な組版のこだわりなど、ビッグローブ辞書アプリならでは --- 【３】コピー＆ペースト --- 　単語や文章をコピー＆ペーストしてメールで共有が可能 --- 【４】紙の辞書で慣れ親しんだ使い方も --- 　気になる箇所にはマーカー・メモが可能。自分だけの辞典を作る楽しみを、ビッグローブの辞書アプリでもぜひ実感して下さい☆　 　 --- 【５】「ブックマーク」「履歴」で振り返り　 --- 　ブックマークでは、覚えたい単語をフォルダ分けして登録しておけば自分だけの英単語帳が出来上がり。 アプリが検索や表示履歴を自動記録、表示回数と一緒に残ります。 --- 【６】自分仕様の辞書アプリ --- 　検索、マーカーメモなどメニューの表示や位置を変えられ、カラーも3色（赤、青、橙）から選べます --- 【７】オフラインで使えるベストセラー英語辞典 --- 　ウィズダムの英和辞典 第3版と和英辞典 第2版がインストールされるため、ネットに接続不要です。 地下鉄でも海外でも安心してご利用いただけます。 --- 【８】用例・語法・コラムが充実 --- ◎ウィズダム英和辞典 第3版 　現代英語・語法に強い上級学習英和。類書中最大級、学習・実務のニーズに対応する10万2千項目を収録。コーパスを活用し、「生きた英語」を精緻に分析。語法・読解・文法・オーラルとあらゆる角度から学習サポートするコラムも多数 ◎ウィズダム和英辞典 第2版 　総合的英語発信力が身につく上級和英辞典。英語のまとまった文章を書くために約9万項目を収録。言い換え例を豊富に示した充実の約8万4千の用例。詳細な語法・類語解説。英作文のヒント、大学入試の自由英作文に頻出パターンの模範解答例など新コラムも多数 ※コーパス（大規模英語データベース）。実際に用いられる語彙・英文法を解析し、英語・英会話を効率的に学べる仕組み 【対応OS】 ・Android 2.2以上 My Doc Notes FREE helps you to remember the important questions for your next doctor’s visit. Before your appointment, record your critical issues quickly and easily in text or voice memo format. At your visit, refer back to your questions to make sure your urgent issues are addressed. My Doc Notes FREE also allows you to record your visit to help remember what was discussed; relevant medical issues, complex medical terminology or next steps. Jot down reminders about your prescriptions, side effects, symptoms, or test results or create your own topic folders. My Doc Notes FREE helps you become an educated and empowered patient. My Doc Notes FREE features: • Create or organize folders by topic • Add text notes • Add voice memos with playback • Add due dates • Add note priorities • Record and playback your doctor’s visit (with your doctor’s permission) • See all questions in a single folder • Upgrade to ad-free My Doc Notes for $1.99 • iOS and Android platforms
release_text: - Ability to email voice memos to self or family - Note priority color highlights - Note formatting updates - Date formatting updates - Auto speakerphone playback - Ability to rate the app in the App Store

description: ★★★ Concept ★★★ This is virtual pet live wallpaper with Tamagotchi concept which you have to take care of your panda pet. You need to give him food, play with him, and keep him healthy by bathing him. This live wallpaper come with happiness, energy, and health indicator to help you keep track on your pet's condition. ★★★ Pet Animations ★★★ This cute little panda called Panko. He will sleep, play, roll and do a lot of cute animation on your home screen. Touch him to wake him up and play with him. Try to caress him to make him happy. Touch at an empty area to pet him by dropping his favorite food. Bathe him to keep him healthy. Try to playing some music and see him dancing and singing. You can choose several swipe action (caress, bath, tickles, drag). ★★★ Theme ★★★ This live wallpaper come with 4 different interactive season themes (summer, autumn, winter, spring). Featuring many other bugs and animal representing each seasons like bees for summer, butterflies for spring, dragonflies for autumn and snow rabbits for winter and they are responding to touch event too. Special themes will be added in special occasions. We have updated this live wallpaper with Easter themed! ★★★ Screenshot ★★★ Now you can take a screenshot of your beloved pet by tapping on camera icon. You can show and hide this camera icon in live wallpaper setting. Your screenshot will be saved on PandaLiveWallpaper folder. This is why we need EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission. ★★★ Instruction ★★★ - When Happiness Indicator is low, Panko will show sad animation. Caress him (by swiping on screen) to make him happy again. - When Energy Indicator is low, that mean Panko is hungry. Give him food by tapping on empty area on screen. Feeding will also increase his happiness level. - When Health indicator is low, he will get sick. Give him medical treatment by tap on injection button and then tap on Panko. To keep him healthy, bathe him regularly by tap on shampoo button and then swipe on Panko. - Each food has a different effect on the happiness, energy, and health. - Go to wallpaper setting --> profile, to set pet's name, owner's name and enable name plat on live wallpaper ★★★ Features ★★★ ~ Various cute panda animation ~ Feeding animation with various choice of food ~ Caress animation (swipe on Panko to make him happy) ~ Bathe animation (activate bath button and swipe on Panko) ~ Tickles animation (swipe on Panko to make him happy) ~ Happiness, Energy, and Health Indicator (set position and color on setting) ~ Dance animation when user playing music on background ~ Profile setting (pet's name and owner's name) ~ Battery level notification ~ Screenshot ~ Interactive spring theme (with cherry blossom falling effect) ~ Interactive summer theme (with dandelion effect) ~ Interactive fall theme (with falling leaves effect) ~ Interactive winter theme (with snow fall effect) ~ Interactive Easter special theme ~ Future update for special themes ~ Portrait and Landscape orientation support ~ Tablet support ~ Small battery usage ~ MoveToSD support If you like cute animal, then this would be the best virtual pet live wallpaper for you. It's also very good live wallpaper for Christmas =) To open and setting up your live wallpaper: Home-> Press menu-> wallpapers-> Live Wallpapers. ★★★ Credit ★★★ ~ Trisha Bird : For helping us testing on Galaxy Note II. Thanks :)
release_text: V2.5.2 ~ Bug Fixed V2.5.1 ~ Added New Pet's Ability: Battery Level Notification (setting on Pet's Profile Setting page) ~ Added cheat mode (indicator stop decrease when reached 15%) ~ Fixed touch detection issue ~ Changed icon V2.4 ~ Change shower button to swipe button ~ Added move panda feature ~ Added tickles feature ~ Bugs fixed V 2.3.4 ~ Added random food feature ~ Added food and bath count information on profile page ~ Fixed crash issue on some devices when try to set wallpaper

description: Having trouble explaining where you are? With this app, you can send your location by SMS or sharing it by facebook, email and others, with your friends. First you confirm your location and then you send a secret code to your friends and only your friends can know where you are. Then they start the app and enter the code you sent. After 15 minutes, the app deletes your location for security reasons. NOTE: If the app can't get your location, reboot your device and try again.

-- Super Birdy Hunter -- Floppy Bird & Clumsy Bird are back but not in the way you think! Now you'll have the chance to let go of some steam and take it out on them, with an assault rifle! Introducing a new unique colorful 3D environment. - Let the Hunt Begin! Including --------------------------------------------------------- - Three challenging endless gameplay modes. - They are taking over! - Runaway bird! - Hungry bird! - Three types of targets. - The Original - Stronger - Faster - Assault Rifle! - Gyro & Standard Controls. - Ranking Highscore - Funny Hats & More. Enjoy! Unlocks --------------------------------------------------------- If you like the game and want us to add more birds, weapons, levels and more, please tell your friends to download the game. We'll add more content to the game if the game reaches certain milestones. + 250000 Downloads / New Character + 500000 Downloads / New Character + 100000 Downloads / Boss + More ---------------------------------------------------------

Beware, Super addictive game. Spank the pig according to the sequence. You only have 0.5 second between each hit. Miss it, you lose! Too slow, you lose! Try to beat our developer score! 100 = Bronze, 200 = Silver, 300 = Gold, Developer Score = Not Easy to Beat! Note: The time between each hit get shorter as you spank! Game Centre to check high score around the world!
release_text: Version 1.1.5 -Added new Story mode -Improve UI, -Minor Bug fix. Version 1.1.4 - Added advanced difficulty after reaching 300 pigs

description: Hammer of Thor is a great looking application that lets you experience the might of the legendary Mjölnir. First charge your hammer by shaking your device and then release the lightning by performing a swinging motion with your hand. Hammer of Thor features engaging graphics, particle effects, realistic sounds and motion based interactivity to enrich your experience. It also tracks your strike statistics on the info screen.

Papa Pear Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga! It's a Papa Fiesta! Bounce your way through this unique puzzle game. Take aim and unleash Papa Pear to bounce and boing around a wacky world of fruity pegs, hazelnuts and crazy chillies. Exciting adventures await you in the Fruity Forest, Pearsylvania and beyond. BOING! Take on this epic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! Papa Pear Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment. By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms ------------------------------- Papa Pear Saga features: • Pearfect graphics that will have you bouncing for joy  • Boosters and power ups to help with those challenging levels  • Special items to unlock by completing levels  • Easy and fun to play, challenging to master  • Hundreds of wonderfully wacky levels - more added every 2 weeks! • Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors! • Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet ------------------------------- Already a fan of Papa Pear Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:  facebook.com/PapaPearSaga  twitter.com/PapaPearSaga  Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Papa Pear Saga!
release_text: Episode 37 is LIVE with 15 NEW levels! That makes a total of 555! Papa Pear is ready for the summer! Are you? Join Papa and Papapaya in the beaches of Malibu for a fresh and pearrific vacation! Note: No fruits or vegetables were harmed during the making of this Episode

description: Advertising supported. You can make an in-app purchase to remove the adverts. Use the new Android 4.2 Jelly Bean Alarm Clock on older Android devices. Works back to Android 2.3 Gingerbread. Also includes the new STOPWATCH and TIMER! The analogue clock can be used as a home screen widget. On Android 4.2, this version adds the ability to use the analogue clock as a lock screen widget. As seen on the Nexus 4, 7 and 10!

EnterpriseProManager is the most complete and the most intuitive solution to manage your company. It offers you a simple management of the customers, the suppliers, the quotes, the invoices, the orders, the stock and the products/articles. This application is going to facilitate you your life by offering you diverse features of management, generation PDF, monitoring, export and statistics of your quotes, invoices and order. You are an entrepreneur, an independent, small or medium-sized company, liberal profession... EnterpriseProManager was designed for you in a customizable way to give yourselves the possibility of managing easily your products and of adding in your invoices, quotes and orders, the useful information of your company which change a country in an other one, such as: N VAT, TAX, VAT, Code APE, SIRET, … To save time, EnterpriseProManager allows you to export and to import easily your products and customers/suppliers from an Excel file by basing on a model file. Besides the basic features, EnterpriseProManager allows to generate easily your invoice, quote and order in a PDF file and to send it by email to your customer or supplier with a simple click. You want to export your invoices, quotes or orders validated or not? With EnterpriseProManager you can filter your quotes/invoices/orders and export them towards an Excel file or CSV to integrate them into another external tool. With the feature of statistics, you can track your sales dayly, monthly or yearly and compare it with previous years. EnterpriseProManager is a complete tool that will simplify your financial management and accounting of your business. Features: - Customer Management - Suppliers management - Quote Management - Invoice Management - Stock management - Movements management (inputs/outputs) - Alerts or over of stock management - Orders suppliers (purchase orders) management - Orders customers (sale orders) management - Management of paying bills/invoices - Transform quote to invoice - Transform order to invoice - Generation of invoice, quote or orders to PDF - Sending of quotes, invoices and orders by email - Export details of quotes, invoices and orders to an Excel or CSV file - Sending of exports by email - Management Setup: logo, company stamp, currency, tax, date format... - Statistics of sales per day, month, year and customer - Ability to add a customer/Supplier from a contact. - Product/articles Management - Management category of products - Import/Export products - Export of movements - Ability to add invoice/quote/order lines from the products - Ability to change the number of the invoice/quote/order - Import/Export customers or suppliers - Ability to add discount by invoice and by details - Generation catalogs of product in PDF - Generation inventory of product in PDF - Attaching a document PDF (data sheet) with the product - Scan bar code of products - Save and restore Database - Possibility of signing a quote or order https://www.facebook.com/EnterpriseProManager To improve this application, please send me your requests to add features, feedback, comments or bugs/problems ( askeranis@gmail.com ). Tags: Management, Professional, Enterprise, Invoices, Quotes, customers, suppliers, product, catalog, stock, inventory, order, signature, accounting, transaction, PDF generation, Export, Import, Excel, CSV, Statistics

Extreme SUV Driving Simulator 3D is the best off-road car simulator of 2015, thanks to its advanced offroad real physics engine. Ever wanted to try an off-road car simulator? Now you can drive the fastest 4x4 SUV cars and feel a sports rally car driver in this free game! Be a furious off-road racing driver on several different environments for you. No need to brake because of city traffic parking or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing your 4x4 SUV truck! Drifting fast and doing burnouts offroad had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt or climb a hill, but always show your racer skills! GAME FEATURES ------------------------------------------ Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed. ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off! Explore a detailed open world environment. Realistic car damage. Crash your car! Accurate driving physics. Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows Several different cameras. Different game modes featuring auto traffic, free roam and checkpoints. Will you be able to find all collectibles? This game was previously called Extreme Rally 4x4 Simulator 3D.

GO SMS Pro - Nearly 100 Million users' choice, all time #1 messaging app to replace the stock! The brand new messaging app is simple, intuitive, personalizing and fun! GO SMS Pro comes with beautiful themes, lovely stickers, private box, GO chat (send free SMS & MMS) , pop up windows, dual sim support, and much more. We are committed to making GO SMS Pro faster, safer and tons of great features - messaging has never been so fun and efficient! ---------------------------------------------- What our users say about our product: "Undoubtedly, Go SMS offers the best messaging services and most advanced features among all the Android applications by far and totally deserves to bear the title as the best messaging app for Android." - Techaron "For a much better SMS/MMS experience on Android, check out GO SMS Pro. This free messaging app has an elegant, customizable UI and a ton of SMS features including scheduling, folders organization, sending over Wi-Fi, and more—with very little memory usage too." - Lifehacker "GO SMS Pro isn’t your usual SMS replacement app, it takes the messaging experience to the next level. Everything from an endless amount of themes to an uncanny amount of customization make this messaging app stand out from the rest." - Androidmeter ---------------------------------------------- Free Features: - Hundreds of personalized themes and lovely stickers (keep increasing) - Private box to encrypt messages & protect your privacy - GO chat support for free messages and group messaging - Sticky conversations help you focus on important contacts by sticking them at the top - Pop up new messages for quick viewing and replying - Dual SIM matching, supports 8,000+ dual SIM devices (keep increasing) - SMS blocker smartly block blacklist/keywords and filter spam messages - Automatically categorize strangers conversations and keep your Inbox simplicity Pro Features: - Support disabling all sponsored messages - Advanced Private Box for renaming or hiding entrance, faking notification as well - Customize the time of "delay to send" - Unlimited cloud storage space for message backup - Free to enjoy all the Getjar paid themes (Upgrade to Themes VIP) Follow Us Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gosmspro Google+: https://plus.google.com/communities/101889041913381333536 Contact Us: gosms@goforandroid.com Use of this app is governed by our Terms of Service: http://www.goforandroid.com/en/term-of-service.html Privacy Policy: http://www.goforandroid.com/en/privacy-policy.html

description: The maker of the famous "Bacon Farts" app, inspired by the Thanksgiving holiday, has released his latest fart sound masterpiece. (Yes, I said MASTER. PIECE.) Whether enjoying these high-quality digital fart sounds with family at the Thanksgiving dinner table, or afterward while burning off the L-Tryptophan, Thanksgiving Farts will fill your hearts with joy and your home with laughter! With 26 awesome fart sounds, specially themed for Thanksgiving, you'll have your family drenched with tears. ** It's free. So we'll be happy to double... no... TRIPLE your money back if you aren't laughing yourself silly. (** Not responsible for accidental injury or death as a result of uncontrollable laughter. Consult a physician before attempting to use this app. Do not use around fun-haters. Results may vary.)

Learn the basics of Photoshop CS6 totally FREE! Developed by Photoshop CS6 experts, SoloLearn’s interactive video tutorials, checkpoints, and quizzes make it fun and exciting to learn. Learn to edit photos and improve image quality with this powerful editing and graphic design program. Our comprehensive tutorials and hands-on exercises cover a wide range of topics and tools including the following and many more: • Layers • Filters • Cropping • Retouching and Manipulation • Color Editing • Object Removal • Working with Backgrounds • Adobe Camera Raw And don’t forget to collect colorful points and compete with fellow learners around the world! Begin to learn and play now with SoloLearn!
release_text: * New video-quiz navigation control. * Performance and stability improvements. * Introducing Shortcuts: now you can jump to your desired level!

description: The Fast and Secure way to automagically Connect to Fanshawe's WiFi network. 1. Log into the app using your FOL account 2. Connect to "Fanshawe Students" or "Fanshawe Employees" WiFi 3. ... 4. No need to log in log in using your browser 5. Click links that will automatically send you to FOL and FOL Email without the need to login. SOURCE: https://github.com/GabrielCastro/fanshawe-connect Issues https://github.com/GabrielCastro/fanshawe-connect/issues

Die App zum Radio 24 Ostergame: #HaeschEier? Der RadioRabbit schickt Dich auf die Insel! Wer braucht Strand, Sonne, Meer und Entspannung? Sammle soviele Eier wie möglich und Spiele am Ostermontag im grossen Finale on Air! Spiel als Jontsch, Elena oder Dominik, lass Dich vom RadioRabbit nicht erwischen und sammle täglich soviele Eier wie möglich! Hinweis: Die HaeschEier App sowie die Teilnahme am Radio 24 Ostergame sind kostenfrei. Mehr Informationen findest du auf unserer Webseite: www.radio24.ch Haftungsausschuss: 1. Apple ist in keiner Weise in das Radio 24 Ostergame involviert. 2. Apple ist kein Sponsor des Radio 24 Ostergame. 3. Bei den Radio 24 Ostergame-Gewinnen handelt es sich nicht um Apple Produkte. The App for Radio 24 Easter Game: #HaeschEier? The radio Rabbit sends you to the island! Who needs the beach, sun, sea and relaxation? Collect as many eggs as possible and Games on Easter Monday in the grand final on Air! Play as Jontsch, Elena or Dominik, let yourself from the radio Rabbit not catch and collect as many eggs as possible every day! Note: The HaeschEier app and participation in the Radio 24 Easter Game will be charged. More information can be found on our website: www.radio24.ch Disclaimer: 1. Apple is in no way involved 24 Easter Game in the radio. 2. Apple is not a sponsor of the Radio 24 Easter game. 3. The Radio 24 Easter Game Winning is not around Apple products.

With PhotoVoice you can record your own voice and put it in the pictures available in your gallery or taken by the camera. The result is a beautiful video telling a story narrated by you. It's easy! And also you can: - Add a background music - Choose the duration per photo - Share the final video in your favorite social network (Instagram, Facebook and even on WhatsApp) - Save your video in SD card in Mpeg4 format It is better than the resource that adds voice on pictures of Samsung Galaxy S4 (SIV) or Flipagram..

M-SoftSaci é a versão mobile do SoftSaci. O M-SoftSaci permite o rastreamento e visualização dos gráficos de execução de estacas tipo hélice contínua em máquinas perfuratrizes que possuem instalado o sistema Saci de monitoramento da Geodigitus. Para execução do programa é necessário credenciais de acesso, que são fornecidas junto com o sistema de monitoramento. Se você não possui uma perfuratriz hélice contínua com o sistema Saci de monitoramento instalado, não faça o download deste programa, pois não terá utilidade para você. SoftSaci-M is the mobile version of SoftSaci. The M-SoftSaci allows tracking and visualization of graphs running in continuous flight auger piles type drilling machines that have installed the system for monitoring the Saci Geodigitus. To run the program you need access credentials, which are provided with the monitoring system. If you do not have a continuous helix drill with Saci monitoring system installed, do not download this program, it will not be useful for you.

Super Sky Butter World is a fun Arcade Game. The Evil Force has kidnapped Majestic Butter. Control and Guide Sky to the end of the Evil Block Fortress where the Evil King has imprisoned Majestic Butter. Avoid Fire, Break-open the Question Blocks, Step on the enemies to destroy them, and most importantly Gather as many Butters as possible on the way to the Majestic Butter. Give it a try now! Beat the whole 3 Stages and 45 Levels to rescue Majestic Butter and have him back in your arms!

"Stockfish Chess" is an Android port of the famous chess engine "Stockfish 4". You need a graphical user interface for playing against this engine. Please download the application "Chess for All" from "Google Play Store".
release_text: Source code released on GitHub. IDE: Conversion of Eclipse on Android Studio.
