Package Buddy is a package tracking app designed to allow you to track your packages, from many carriers (listed below), anywhere you go with your phone or tablet. Sync with all of your Android devices (no extra cost if linked on same Google Account). Pro users can now forward shipping confirmation emails to packages@package-buddy.com to automatically add packages to their account (BETA). Use the settings to customize your experience. Set which lists to display, how much information to show, and when your device automatically updates/backs-up/syncs. Visit the FAQ on our site for more information. Add packages easily by entering in the necessary information, or head to http://www.package-buddy.com/code to create a QR code to scan in. Send package information to others easily with the share screen. You can click on some carrier links to automatically fill out package information into Package Buddy. With Package Buddy, you can see a detailed history and a map of the progress for your packages (amount of detail depends on carrier). If you notice **ANY** problems with Package Buddy please send an **EMAIL**. Comments **DO NOT** allow us to communicate to you, which is vital. If you have a carrier or a feature you want added, just let us know and we'll see if it can be done. There's also a new tablet upgrade which has all the features of the pro version and optimizes how information is shown for tablets (not necessary to run on tablets, just an extra feature). Thanks everyone for your support! Note: A package being visible on Amazon works slightly different. Check the carrier's site that they are using for actual tracking data. The following carriers are supported: - A-1 International - Adrexo - Aeronet - Air21 - American Airlines Cargo - AmeriJet - An Post - Aramex - Argix Direct - ATS Solutions - Australia Post - Australian Air Express - Belgin Post - Belpost - Canada Post - CEVA - City Link - Continental Cargo - Chronopost - Colissimo - Collect Plus - Correios Brazil - Correos Chile - Correos del Ecuador - Correos Spain - Courier Post (NZ) - CTT Portugal - Cyprus Post - DB Schenker - DB Schenker Privpak - Delta Cargo - DHL - DHL ACG - DHL Brazil - DHL Canada - DHL DE - DHL GM - DHL Poland - DHL Same Day - DHL Spain - DHL Sweden - DHL UK - Direct Freight Express - DPD - DPD Ireland - DPD Poland - DPD UK - Dynamax - Empost - Ensenda - Expeditors - FedEx - FedEx UK - Flyt Express - Forward Air - GLS - GSO - HDNL - Hermes - Hermes UK - Hong Kong Post - i-parcel - Interlink - Irish Post - Israel Post - Itella - Japan Post - Korea Post - Lasership - LBC Express - Luxembourg Post - Magyar Post - Mail Express - Matkahuolto - Metrowide Courier Express - MRW ES - Newgistics - OCS - Old Dominion - OnTrac - Parcel Force - Poczta Polska - PonyExpress Post - Pos Indonesia - Pos Daftar - Pos Laju - Pos Malaysia - Post Austria - Post Denmark - Post NL - Posten.no - Posten.se - PPL - Prestige - Purolator - Quick International - R & L Carriers - Royal Mail - Saudi Post - Servientrega - Singapore Post - Southeastern Freight - Star Track Express - Swiss Post - Team Worldwide - TNT - TNT Express Australia - TNT Post NL - TNT UK - Toll IPEC - Tollpost - Turkish Post - UCS - UKMail - Ukrposhta - UPS - UPS Air Cargo - UPS Mail Innovations - UPS Supply Chain Solutions - USPS - Xend - Yodel - YRC

description: You know how cumbersome it can be to type out your email address on your phone or tablet. Even if my Chrome browser logs in automatically, I frequently end up typing my email address on some sites, again and again. If you are like me, then this little widget is for you! How it works? =========== This is a simple widget that you can put on your home-screen and when the time comes, simply touch it, to copy the email address! Then you can paste it anywhere using the Android default "Paste" option. -: FEATURES :- - Shows all email IDs configured on your device. Resize widget to see more IDs - Copy any of your email address to the Android clipboard with a single touch - No internet permission required. No ads - No background service. Very less battery usage. You can always choose to log-out from websites, knowing that it is now easy to enter your email address! Note: * There is no app icon in the main launcher. You can find it in the Widget section as "Touch N Paste" * This widget does NOT run in the background and hence does not consume any battery. * Accounts permission required to access your email addresses

What is Circuit Training? Circuit training is an excellent way to improve mobility, strength and stamina. The circuit training comprises of 6 to 10 strength exercises that are completed one exercise after another. Each exercise is performed for a set time before moving on to the next exercise. The exercises within each circuit are separated by a short rest period, and each circuit is separated by a longer rest period. The total number of circuits performed during a training session may vary from two to six depending on your training level (beginner, intermediate, or advanced), your period of training (preparation or competition) and your training objective. Why choose our mobile app for Circuit Training? Our Circuit Training sequences is built by Circuit Training professionals and our Circuit Training program is easy to learn and follow. Our app include powerful key features including: - Circuit Training Tutorial - Circuit Training Timer - Training Day Record - Facebook Community - Easy to Use Interface

MedCalc 3000 EBM Stats MedCalc 3000 is the most popular and comprehensive Medical Calculator system on the web. It has been highly acclaimed, reviewed and tested over the last 12 years. MedCalc 3000 EBM Stats is your Android answer for evidence-based medical calculations and medical statistics. Here you will find essential EBM equations, statistics tools and a a full suite of dose and unit converters ready for use, right in the palm of your hand! MedCalc 3000 makes the math of EBM simple! Equations included: Bayesian Statistics Benefit Increase / Number Needed to Treat Chi Square Analysis Confidence Interval of a Binomial Proportion Confidence Interval of a Difference Between Proportions Confidence Interval of a Ratio of Proportions Confidence Interval of a Ratio of Ratios Confidence Interval of a Survey False Negative Rate from Sensitivity and Prevalence False Negative Ratio from Sensitivity and Prevalence False Positive Rate from Specificty and Prevalence False Positive Ratio from Specificity and Prevalence Kappa Measurement of Inter-observer Agreement: Bennett's Der Nettolohn.de Gehaltsrechner als kostenlose App Nach dem großen Erfolg der App für das iPhone (rund 1.000 Bewertungen mit 4,5 von 5 Sternen) ab sofort auch mit dem Android Smartphone immer „Vorher wissen, was netto in der Tüte bleibt!“ Der Gehaltsrechner von Nettolohn.de für Android Handys berechnet jederzeit Ihr Nettogehalt. Basierend auf der aktuellen Lohnsteuertabelle und entsprechend der aktuellen Gesetzeslage eignet sich die kostenlose App bestens, um Ihre letzte Lohnabrechnung zu prüfen oder um das zukünftige Nettoeinkommen zu errechnen. Daneben dient Ihnen der Gehaltsrechner Nettolohn.de als solide und zuverlässige Grundlage für erfolgreiche Gehaltsgespräche mit Arbeitgebern. Bei der Berechnung des Nettogehalts berücksichtigt der Gehaltsrechner von Nettolohn.de sämtliche steuerlichen Konditionen. Ob Steuerklasse, Kinder- und Steuerfreibetrag oder Kranken- und Pflegeversicherung sowie Arbeitslosen- und Rentenversicherung, Kirchensteuer und betriebliche Altersvorsorge – der Gehaltsrechner lässt nichts aus. Fachbegriffe rund um die Berechnung des Nettoeinkommens werden auf Wunsch leicht verständlich erklärt und räumen mögliche Unklarheiten schnell aus dem Weg, sodass sicher keine Fragen offen bleiben. Die Bedienung des Gehaltsrechners könnte nicht leichter sein. Durch die Erlaubnis für die Standortbestimmung per WLAN/Mobilfunknetz, entfällt sogar die Eingabe des jeweiligen Bundeslandes, da der Standort automatisch lokalisiert wird. Im Anschluss geben Sie Ihr aktuelles beziehungsweise zukünftiges Bruttoeinkommen ein, das gewünschten Abrechnungszeitfenster sowie Ihre Steuerklasse, Ihr Alter und gegebenenfalls die Anzahl Ihrer Kinder und die Kirchensteuer. Die App errechnet nun in Sekundenschnelle Ihr Nettogehalt. Um bei der Berechnung Ihres Nettolohns das für Sie bestmögliche Ergebnis zu erzielen, können Sie beliebig Änderungen vornehmen und verschiedene Varianten durchspielen. Experimentieren Sie und verfolgen Sie mit, wie sich Ihre unterschiedlichen Eingaben jeweils auf Ihren Nettolohn auswirken, um festzustellen, ob sich beispielsweise ein Steuerklassenwechsel für Sie lohnen würde oder wie viel bei einer möglichen Gehaltserhöhung netto noch in der Lohntüte bleiben würde. Der Gehaltsrechner von Nettolohn.de bietet Ihnen aber noch mehr. Wenn Sie die Höhe der monatlich zu zahlenden Lohnsteuer, des Solidaritätszuschlags oder der Kirchensteuer interessiert, so zeigt Ihnen der Rechner diese Daten ebenfalls sofort an. Außerdem können Sie detailliert die Beträge einsehen, die Ihr Arbeitgeber zu Ihrem Bruttolohn zuzahlen muss – ein Feature, dass besonders Arbeitgebern gute Dienste leistet. Sie können den Gehaltsrechner bei bestehender Internet-Verbindung jederzeit nutzen. Die Online-Nutzung des Rechners bietet Ihnen den großen Vorteil, dass mögliche Gesetzesneuerungen unmittelbar in Ihre Berechnungen mit einfließen können und Ihnen ein Höchstmaß an Aktualität garantieren. Da der Rechner bereits vor dem Jahreswechsel integriert wird, und zwar sobald die neuen Berechnungssätze vorliegen, können Sie schon im Vorfeld sehen, wie sich Ihr Nettogehalt voraussichtlich im neuen Jahr entwickeln wird. Außerdem können Sie sich auf Wunsch die Gehaltsberechnungen für die beiden vorausgegangenen Jahre jederzeit problemlos anzeigen lassen. Der Gehaltsrechner von Nettolohn.de steht Ihnen zusätzlich auf dem Finanzportal Nettolohn.de zur Verfügung. Zudem bietet Ihnen Nettolohn.de einen umfangreichen Gehaltsvergleich sowie Gehaltsstatistiken, ein Lexikon zum Gehalt und zur Privatversicherung, Informationen zu vielen verschiedenen Berufen und ein Online-Magazin mit interessanten Beiträgen rund um das Thema Finanzen und Steuern. Weitere praktische Rechner unterstützen Sie beispielsweise bei der optimalen Wahl der Steuerklasse oder um mögliche Folgen von Kurz- oder Teilzeitarbeit auf Ihr Nettoeinkommen einsehen zu können. Get the highest score in the challenging and fast-paced Arcade Mode, or select the Relax Mode if you want to chill out and enjoy the beautiful, relaxing gameplay. Easy to learn, hard to master. Exercise your stategic skills and think ahead to create amazing super-combos and reach your goal. Think out of the box to get extra bonus points and become a master! Hours of fun are guaranteed. Swap tiles, match colors and combine elements to cross the rainbow and get your own golden treasure! description: With sixteen radio stations and a news agency, Cogeco Diffusion has something for every listener in Québec. That’s 16 radio stations at your fingertips! The Beat 92.5 is the group's only English-language station and is Montreal’s only English-language Hot Adult Contemporary station. French-language stations include the Rythme FM network (Montreal, Estrie, Mauricie, Outaouais, Saguenay et Abitibi), 96.9 CKOI FM, 98,5 fm Montréal and its talk network (104,7 fm Outaouais, 107,7 fm Estrie and 106,9 fm Mauricie), Radio Circulation 730, 102,9 Québec, FM 93 Québec and CIME (Laurentians). Cogeco News Agency is the information provider for all of the stations operated by Cogeco Diffusion and also provides many other radio stations with national and international news. Cogeco News is heard throughout most of Québec. Cogeco Diffusion - Radio for everyone, across Québec.

With your super detailed F/A-18 Super Hornet, F-14 Tomcat or C-2A Greyhound you will involved in ground attacks, navy landing operations and search and rescue missions. Disengage your jet from enemy SAM missiles, avoid radars, select your favorite weapons and destroy warships, shoot choppers and try always-new free scenarios from online community. New revolutionary scenario builder: build your terrain within your mobile device, design your missions adding objects and targets, play your own and publish to share worldwide. description: Simeji is the Japanese keyboard app with many Kawaii emoji and emoticons! With Simeji, you will get various cute emoji and frustration-free communication via SMS, chat, text and email. It’s the perfect keyboard for android for smart, fun and easy input. Try out Simeji, the very popular Japanese input app! 【About Simeji】 ✔Simeji is the practical Japanese keyboard ever, with emoji, emoticons, text face (smileys) and ASCII art ✔Usable at anywhere, like Facebook, Twitter and Whatsapp ✔Easily customized kawaii (=cute) skins and colorful backgrounds ✔Simeji Cloud IME service, which enables user to register own conversions, including funny jokes and Kaomoji, and to share these word conversion among Simeji users. A great number of new converting words, like buzz words, funny jokes, and Kaomoji, have been added to this Simeji Cloud IME along with our original “Simeji Cloud Conversion” . In this process to register conversion to Simeji Cloud IME, we have operating committee to avoid publish inappropriate words. Simeji truly appreciates Simeji users for their passions and attentions to improve Simeji conversion quality. ✔Trying better experience not only for input typing, but also for modifying its setting ・Easy access to setting via slide menu by tapping Simeji mark on keyboard and via control panel on keyboard above area. ・Long pressing「あ/A」button draws various settings for customization. Easy setting examples: Control Panel (on/off available in input support setting) [Copy]...Copy, Cut, Paste and Select All buttons with Starting point adjustment option and directional keys. [Text Stamp]...Over 500 ascii arts are available. Additionally registered text stamps on user dictionary are accessible from this button. [Voice input]...Text input with voice input（Voice input API by Google） [Easy settings]...Switches for Simeji Cloud ON/OFF, and flick ON/OFF Slide Menu [Mushroom]...Simeji original function to access supplemental input Apps, which other App adapted recently. Downloading mushroom Apps enhances your input experience. [Skin Gallery]...Various designed skins are available for users [Simeji settings]...Easy to customize Simeji as your IME Long pressing「あ/A」button [Keyboard Layout]...For selecting keyboard layouts [Keyboard height]...For keyboard height adjusting [Width adjustment]...Especially for large screen users, it helps to adjust width [Key-top color]...For changing key-top letter color [Setting]...To access Simeji main setting page [Input Method]...For switching between keyboard apps [Simeji setting] [Keyboard]...For Keyboard customizing, such as selecting keyboard layout, letter color and flick settings. [Skin]...Access to Skin Gallery, Button Skin, My Skin (import image from user’s photo gallery for setting as skin) in order to customize keyboard appearance. [Dictionary/Conversion]...For customizing local dictionaries, setting Simeji Cloud conversion, and clearing local word learning history. [Input support]...For customizing extra details around input, like key press sounds, turning on and off control panel. [Mushroom]...Turing on and off mushrooms to be shown in the slide menu. [About Simeji]...Access to online manual and sending feedback. ※ Moving Simeji app to microSD card may force quit due to Android keyboard system. Therefore Simeji prohibit this moving. ※ In case you realise slow reaction or frequent force quits, please try turning off or installing again after uninstalling.

description: From the creator of the popular SpiritVox comes The "Spirifone" REAL-TIME EVP RECORDER! Built for Ghost Hunters by Ghost Hunters! This is one of the most important tools you can have for Ghost Hunting and Paranormal Investigations! Stop waiting to review recordings to find out if you captured something. Now you can hear you recording AS IT IS HAPPENING. This is a first for A.B.G.H (Android based Ghost-Hunting). Plug headphones into your Android device and hit "record" and you can hear everything being recorded onto your SD card via your devices microphone with nearly NO delay! Hardware Real Time EVP recorders cost over $100. This app performs the same function for a fraction of the cost of a hardware device and achieves the same results. No more waiting to review recordings to see if you caught something. If you do catch anything you will hear it right then and there! Files are saved to your SD card named with time/date stamp in .wav format. Features: REAL TIME RECORDING AND PLAYBACK WAV FORM DISPLAY REWIND/FAST-FORWARD HIGH QUALITY WAV FORMAT RECORDING Easy to use, simple interface. ***HEADPHONES ARE REQUIRED FOR APP TO FUNCTION!*** REAL EVP Session recorded using Spirifone: http://spiritvox.bigbeardaudio.com/?p=136 If you have ANY questions or problems please email me, I am easy to reach and will do my best to help correct any issues. I cannot reply to reviews/comments. If I cannot solve your issue I am happy to offer a full refund. I support my apps 100% and am always here for my users. I want it to be a trustworthy tool in your ghost hunts. As with all of my Ghost Hunting apps please be aware that RESULTS MAY VARY. Neither myself nor anyone else can guarantee contact with ghost, demons, aliens or your deceased grandmother. But I can offer you a great tool to catch the evidence should activity present itself. Please don't rate the app low if you don't get an EVP right away, this field requires patience! When Ghost Hunting always use common sense and BE SAFE! Never trespass or damage private property, always try to get permission to investigate. Follow me on Twitter: @spiritvoxapp it's a great way to reach me for support or with questions. Also I encourage you to send me any evidence you capture using my apps! TAGS: Ghost hunting. Paranormal. EVP. Real Time Wav Recorder

description: 회원가입 없이 바로 사용할 수 있는 심플한 무료어플! 각종 카톡음/엽기코믹/귀염/효과음을 간단한 조작으로 사용하실 수 있습니다. (벨소리로도 적용 가능) *카카오톡 알림음 설정 방법* 알림음천국 어플에서 원하는 알림음을 받으신 후, 카카오톡의 알림음 설정에서 해당 알림음을 체크해 주세요.

قصص القران للأطفال : أضخم إنتاج عربى من نوعه علي سوق أندرويد يقدم لطفلك سلسلة من أروع القصص الدينية التى وردت فى القرآن الكريم بحيث ينمى مهارات طفلك و يطور قدرته على التخيل و الإستيعاب... هذا ليس كل شيء فهو يزودك بخاصية القصص المصورة والمسموعة و التى تجذب انتباه طفلك و تجعله لا يمل من الاستماع مرات و مرات كما أن مؤثراتها الصوتية الفريدة تجعلة يعيش احداث القصص بكل واقعية... يتميز التطبيق بثراء محتواه و تنوعه حيث يتنقل بطفلك بين مختلف قصص القرآن فمن قصة اسماعيل عليه السلام و بيئتها الصحراوية إلى قصة سليمان عليه السلام مع الهدهد مرورا بناقة صالح عليه السلام و بقرة بنى اسرائيل مما يزيد من مدارك طفلك عن مختلف البيئات و الحيوانات و المعلومات العامة خاصة التاريخية منها. يحتوى التطبيق فى إصداره الأول على أحد عشر قصة فريدة من نوعها و هم: • قصة ناقة صالح عليه السلام • قصة الهدهد مع سليمان عليه السلام • قصة بقرة بنى إسرائيل • قصة عزير عليه السلام • قصة إبراهيم عليه السلام • قصة ميلاد موسى عليه السلام • قصة قارون والبقيه تأتي...

description: Better Bored ---- Better Bored is an app for bored people. If, at the moment, you say "I am bored, so totally bored, that boredom is the core of my being", then this app may change your boredom into happiness. It should brake their boredom and enlighten your live. It consists of funny little mini games which also may be played with more than one player (it is not real multiplayer). Mainly you have to push buttons. Take the challenge! Don't be languid, don't be dull, don't be lazy. But if you are, play this little games and keep easy going and have fun. Be the fastest - or the slowest. At the moment there is one mode for people who like it fast and often and another mode for people who enjoy it slow and chilling. If enough people are interested, other mini games will be added. In the hectic mode you have to push the button as often as you can in 3 seconds. Get the highscore! In the chilling mode you have to push a button for as long as you can. Get the highscore! On top of the board you push the button. After the mini-game is done, your result with motivating tips is shown. Below this the current leader board is shown (at the moment without names - you never know who's watching!). Good luck!
release_text: v1: Initial version v2: removed additional launcher entry v3: new icon v4: nehanced compatibility

description: The newest,easiest to use, and fastest Fast Food Finder in the Android Market. With a few clicks find a quick bite to eat near your current location on the map (or by address and touch). Restaurants are divided into different cuisines and currently restaurants include A&W Restaurants, Arby's, Burger King, Carl's Jr./Hardees, Checkers, Culver's, Dairy Queen, Five Guys, In-And-Out, Jack in the Box, Long John Silver's, McDonald's, Red Robin, Sonic Drive-In, Wendy's, Whataburger, White Castle, Blimpie, Quiznos, Firehouse Subs, and Subway. Chicken places included are Popeye's, KFC or Kentucky Fried Chicken, and Chick Fil A. If Mexican is your thing you can use Find Food Fast to locate a nearby Chipotle, Del Taco, Baja Fresh, or Taco Bell. If you are looking for dessert or a coffee pick me up we have got you covered with Dairy Queen, Baskin Robbins, Cold Stone Creamery, Friendly's, Caribou Coffee, Peet's Coffee, Tim Hortons, Dunkin' Donuts, or Starbucks. If you are craving pizza find the nearest Pizza Hut, Domino's, or Papa Johns. You can also search based on cuisine as well if you aren't sure what restaurant you want to find. Once you select a restaurant the nearest locations will show up on the map. From here you can choose a location and navigation will start or you can view the menu and nutritional information. New restaurants are being added all the time and if something is missing, contact us and we will add it! You can get in touch with us via email at support@brennasoft.com or by any of our social networks accessed by the Brennasoft menu in the app. (accessed by the menu button, or overflow button in Honeycomb) Upcoming Features *Favorites *Checkins *Ratings Required Permissions *Location - determine your location *Internet - to retrieve restaurant data *Access Network State - determine whether on wifi/3g and handle changes This is a third party application and is not affiliated with the mentioned restaurants.
release_text: 1.1.6 Added in-app purchase to remove ads Added Sheetz, Wawa under sandwiches 1.1.5c Bugfixes Added new cuisines/restaurants Refreshed UI, support for ICS/JB 1.1.4 Added custom search option Added Restaurants (Italian Cuisine, Fazolis, zpizza, Olive Garden, Steakhouse, Outback, Lone Star, Red Lobster) 1.1.3 Improved search result accuracy Added Indian, Sushi, Jimmy John's, Ranch 1, Taco Cabana, and several other restaurants. 1.1.2 Added search by address and tap on map.

description: 一年一度的活跃网络健康跑活动将于今年10月18日在西安古城墙上开跑，今年继续保留原有的女子5公里，男子8公里以及一圈13.7公里的赛程项目，并且不断提升参赛体验，敞开怀抱欢迎更多人一起加入，让大家有机会与朋友和家人共同参与。展现个人或团队运动魅力、收获快乐和健康的同时，也能积极影响周围身边需要运动的朋友和同事参与到运动中来！让更多人开始享受到这种健康生活方式带来的快乐。 软件特性: - 提供比赛章程、比赛内容、服务中心、合作单位等相关赛事信息 - 提供比赛成绩在线查询功能，您可以通过我的成绩查看比赛成绩，还可以分享至各大社交网站 - 通过我的注册查看赛事注册信息以及参赛号码 - 通过赛事美图浏览运动员赛场风采，并可通过参赛号码和名字查询相关照片，还可以分享保存 - 通过赛事导航更方便快捷的找到领取参赛包地址以及比赛地点 - 提供西安，成都两个城市的赛事应用，领略不同城市的风采 - 简洁易用的操作、友好的用户界面, 让您在参赛现场也能够快速便捷地使用该软件并享受到马拉松比赛的快乐

description: Visualize Healing is a relaxing guided meditation intended to help you visualize the healing process. Put on your headphones and use the power of your mind as clinical hypnotherapist Andrew Johnson guides you into a deep state of physical and emotional relaxation.

description: Stockholm City Bikes provide rental bikes in central Stockholm. This application has locations for all stations, as well as real-time updated information on bike availability. Main features: - On-demand updates - Map-view with color-coded bike icons. - Comprehensiva and informative list screen. - Completely free, with no in-app adds. Unfortunately, due to legal pressure by the developers of the official app, this app is now discontinued. So I would recommend everyone to install their app instead. Despite being crappy, at least it doesn't cost money anymore. Thanks for using this app!
release_text: - Bike availability updates are now functional again. - Bugfix for application crash on bike update in a corner cases.

description: Footy Predictor predicts the results for the major football leagues in Europe. It is more accurate than bookmakers in the top leages in England, Spain, Italy and Germany. Impress your friends with your predictive accuracy, or maybe make a little money! Featuring a highly accurate alogorithm that has been extensively tested over the last 5 seasons of football fixtures. Also featuring goalCast, our unique prediction of the goal range that teams are most likely to score. When combined with the match predictions it adds an extra level of knowledge and increases accuracy dramatically. Fixtures are updated before every game cycle so that you can prepare well in advance of kickoff. This is the BETA TEST version of the app, so we appreciate be informed of all bugs and errors. We'd also like to hear from you about what you would like to see in the finished app.
release_text: - updated league list page with more leagues and number of games notifier

description: Emoticonos y memes divertidos es una aplicación en la que básicamente se agrupan muchos emoticonos, iconos de animales, memes, imágenes divertidas y otros que puedes compartir por ejemplo por whatsapp o a través de programas que permitan la inclusión de imágenes por medios externos (telegram, line, gmail...). La aplicación de emoticonos está dividida en varias secciones o categorías. Empezando por la categoría de emoticonos, te encontrarás más de cien emoticonos para que puedas compartir a través de whatsapp. Hay emoticonos de frio, de risa, caras divertidas, iconos de ninjas, de fiesta, de camuflaje, emoticonos de demonios, de ángeles, de gente enfadada y muchos muchos más. Siguiendo por la categoría de animales, hay emoticonos de patos, elefantes, zorros, pingüinos, pájaros, abejas, gallinas, osos pandas y un mogollón más de animales con los que amenizar tus conversaciones de whatsapp o de line o telegram. Después tenemos la categoría de memes, que contiene los memes más usados y divertidos como "troll dad", "forever alone", "me gusta", "LOL", "it's something" y un largo etc. Si tenías fiebre por los memes ahora ya los puedes enviar por whatsapp. Y para las épocas navideñas. La app tiene un largo y extenso abanico de emoticonos con motivos navideños como por ejemplo bolas de navidad, gorros de papa noel, muñecos de nieve, iconos de papa noel, renos, estrellas, imágenes de árboles de navidad, palos de caramelo, campanas de navidad y algún que otro emoticono más. Por último tenemos la sección de imágenes divertidas, que como su propio nombre indica contiene un compendio de imágenes divertidas o con frases graciosas que puedes compartir y enviar por whatsapp. Y si te parecen pocos emoticonos, no te preocupes, ya que iremos lanzando actualizaciones con los comentarios que vayamos recibiendo pidiendo nuevos emoticonos, iconos o imágenes. Emoticons and funny memes is an application that basically many emoticons, animal icons, memes, funny pictures and others can share for example whatsapp or through programs that allow the inclusion of images by external means (telegram, grouped line , gmail ...). The application of smileys is divided into several sections or categories. You starting emoticons category, you will find over a hundred emoticons so that you can share via whatsapp. There emoticons cold, laughter, funny faces, icons ninjas, party, camouflage, emoticons demons, angels, angry people and many many more. Continuing on the animal category, there are emoticons ducks, elephants, foxes, penguins, birds, bees, chickens, pandas and a ton more than animals that enliven your conversations whatsapp or line or telegram. Then we have the category of memes, which contains the most used and funny as "troll dad", "forever alone", "like", "LOL", "it's something" and etc memes. If memes had fever and can now send whatsapp. And for the Christmas season. The app has a long and extensive range of emoticons with Christmas such as Christmas balls, caps santa, snowmen, santa icons, reindeer, stars, images of Christmas trees, candy canes, bells Christmas and the occasional emoticon more. Finally we have the funny pictures section, which as the name suggests contains a compendium of fun or funny quotes that you can share and send whatsapp images. And if you look a few emoticons, do not worry, as we will be releasing updates with the comments that we receive asking new emoticons, icons or images.

No more bed bugs. No more closet monsters. No more ‘bump-in-the-nights’. One kid has had enough… With his trusty ping-pong paddle and an arsenal of tricks and gadgets, there will be no scary corner untouched. Gameplay - Retro block breaking with a modern twist - 8 different monsters, with each having different gameplay effects - Quick use items add skill and strategy - Use rebounds to get the highest scores Features - 4 Stages, with each one containing 20 challenging Levels - Go for high scores in the Backyard Stage - 8 unique Items, from Paddle Upgrades, to Extra Lives - Trade Candy and Bottle Caps to acquire items before taking on a level ** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **

Scramble Words goes SOCIAL! ► Create riddles and share crossword puzzles with your friends through Facebook! Be in touch with the world while playing the game. * Learn everyday English, German, French, Japanese and 5 other languages in a fun way * Multiplayer mode speeds up memorizing of new words * Educational game for the whole family * See yourself among the best submitting your score to the online leader board * Master 9 foreign languages Learn foreign languages with an educative word game Scramble Words Free Puzzle! If you enjoy solving crosswords and other types of word puzzles, this brain-teaser is made for you. Scramble Words Free Puzzle is a free way to test your knowledge of a foreign language and learn more. Choose any of 9 languages available: English, German, French, Dutch, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, Russian and Ukrainian. Complete words simply by swapping white letters. If the word is correct all the letters change to one color. This is a good scrabble crossword game for kids because of family-friendly gameplay and simple mechanics. Try to challenge other players online. You are not limited in time to cope with a crossword but you get bonus score for completing the level faster than your opponent. Test you lexis and spelling skills, decipher new words and become a world champion in crossword solving!
release_text: ● New version 2.10.5 supports Android 5.0 ● We have polished the game and fixed some small issues

description: The perfect app for London’s coffee lovers. Buy 8 coffees at Café Rouge Express (currently Euston station only) and get the 9th free. No need to carry around an annoying loyalty card which you can’t find when you need it– do it all with your phone! The app also contains full menu and location information. Note: You will need a QR scanner app installed to use the Loyalty Card page in this app. If you dont already have one we recommend 'QR Reader' which can be downloaded for free and will help you with many other QR related tasks!

Feel the ground quake and hear the crowds roar as everyone prepares for the main event! We’re live on ‘Tank TV’ where bold tactics and artful artillery take center stage in an explosive winner-takes-all battle. Roll the dice to deal detrimental damage and take home the prize in this turn-based battle of brains and brawn. Feel the ground quake and hear the crowds roar in a real-time PVP tournament! Build your team of tanks and face off against rival teams in explosive winner-takes-all battles! Roll the dice to deal detrimental damage and use your prize money to unlock new tanks from over 100 options! FEATURES ● Real-Time PVP: Gather your friends, form a Club, takedown other Clubs from around the world, and share the glory ● Whopping War Machines: Contest for coveted machine parts to build a competition-crushing team of tanks ● Swift Showdowns: Bring out your best tanks and takedown your competition in fast-paced head-to-head battles ● High Risk Choices: Select your targets, time your re-rolls, and unleash strategic attacks to clinch your victory ● Extreme FX: Each battle is packed with big explosions and booming sound effects that will get your adrenaline pumping ● Compete in Live Events: Earn legendary rewards and prizes for taking first place on the league leaderboards ● Get Sponsored: Accept endorsement contacts from Sponsors for a chance at extremely rare parts and tanks Here on Tank TV it's all about The Fans!!! Thanks for all your feedback and reviews! We're constantly working to make this game even more awesome and have really exciting features planned throughout the year.
release_text: Thanks to Scrappers everywhere for your continued support and feedback! Email feedback to support@mobage.com. Tell your friends about SBT! - [NEW] Don't want to fight a bot team? Now you can wait for PVP matches. Always find a PVP match! - [NEW] Future Tank Specials - Visual Improvements to Event Boosted Tanks - Improvements to Drop N Swap parts ordering - Many more fixes

Motorbootsport auf deutschen Wasserstraßen Die App „Motorbootsport“ soll aktiven Motorbootsportlern und denen, die es werden wollen, Basisinformationen über die vorhandene Infrastruktur auf deutschen Gewässern bieten. Anhand Ihres Standortes können Sie die umgebenen Wasserstraßen und deren Sportbootinfrastruktur erkunden. Im Vordergrund stehen natürlich die DMYV-Vereine und deren Häfen mit Ihren Angeboten. Hier finden Sie Service und Unterstützung von Wassersportler zu Wassersportler. Die mit dem „Qualitätssiegel – maritim der Verbände“ gekennzeichneten Häfen bürgen für geprüfte Ausstattung und umfangreiche Serviceangebote. Aufgeführt werden aber auch Marinas und Bootshäuser, die nicht dem Deutschen Motoryachtverband angeschlossen sind. Neben den Häfen und Marinas finden Sie in unserer App Wasserwanderrastplätze und Liegestellen, öffentliche Slipstellen, die Schleusen, Wasserskistrecken und Wassermotorradstrecken. Sollte Ihnen unterwegs der Sprit ausgehen, finden Sie durch die App Wassertankstellen und Serviceeinrichtungen in Ihrer Nähe. Eine kleine Gewässerkunde gibt Ihnen erste Informationen über das von Ihnen befahrene Gewässer. Die Gewässerkunde nimmt Ihnen jedoch nicht die Verpflichtung ab, sich über das von Ihnen gewählte Revier und dessen Besonderheiten tiefergehend zu informieren! Diese App hat nicht den Anspruch auf Vollständigkeit, besonders bei den kommerziellen Angeboten. Für Hinweise und Korrekturen finden Sie ein Feedback-Formular. Hier können Sie dem DMYV Vorschläge und Meinungen zukommen lassen, damit die Datenbank über die Infrastruktur für den Wassersport weiter wächst. Der Deutsche Motoryachtverband e.V. bezweckt die Wahrnehmung und Förderung des Motorbootsports sowie des motorisierten Fahrtenwassersports in all seinen Erscheinungsformen. Der Verband ist gemeinnützig und unterstützt mit dieser App kostenfrei alle Skipper bei der Ausübung Ihres Wassersportes. Realisiert wurde die App von der Appdream AG.

Simply the best touchscreen snooker game in the world. Key Features: - Realistic snooker ball physics - 4 levels of difficulty to play against - Intuitive touch controls; apply spin and swerve with ease - True-to-life snooker tables - 11 unlockable alternate tables with which to play Created by Giles Coope using LibGDX Audio by Tom Colvin for support email friendlymonstergames@gmail.com PLEASE EMAIL RATHER THAN JUST REPORTING ISSUES IN REVIEWS SO I CAN HELP.

description: Puffy Poppers game is highly addictive. You will not be able to put this game down ;-) Hours of fun! WARNING: The game is not easy! But you have possibility to find out level solutions online! It will help to train your problem solving skills. Puffy Poppers is a puzzle game in which you burst puffys to trigger a chain reaction in order to clear level. This is free version with 300 levels. Full version has 3000 levels. FEATURES: * 3 game modes (Normal, Medium, Hard) * Online solution check (requires internet connection) * Adorable graphics * Turn on/off sound effects * Turn on/off vibration effects * Fun for the whole family!

description: リアルなナンバープレート型のバッテリー残量ウィジェット（１×２サイズ）です。 ・色は、白（自家用）、黄（自家用・軽）、緑（事業用）、黒（事業用、黒）、水色（ミニカー）、ピンク（バイク）から選べます。 　また、プレートの透過設定にも対応しました。 ・ナンバープレートの上段と下段に、数字を表示する領域が１つずつあります。 　それぞれについて、バッテリー残量・バッテリー温度・バッテリー電圧のうちどれを表示するか、任意に割り当てることができます。 ・上段の漢字は、「電池」「残量」「温度」「電圧」から選択が可能です。 　また充電状況に応じて、自動的に「充電」「電源(AC接続)」「通信(USB接続)」に切り替えることもできます。 ・下段のひらがなも同様に、「て(電池)」「さ(残量)」「は(バッテリー)」「お(温度)」「あ(電圧)」から選択が可能です。 　充電状況に応じて、自動的に「し(充電)」「え(AC接続)」「ゆ(USB接続)」に切り替えることができます。 ■設置方法 １．ホーム画面上で長押しして設定画面を開き、「ウィジェット」を選択します。 ２．一覧の中から「ナンバープレート電池」を選択してください。 ■設定方法 設置したウィジェットをタップすると、設定画面が開きます。 Battery level widget of license plate type realistic is (1 × 2 size). And colors, you can choose (for business, black), light blue (minicar), pink (bike) White (private), yellow (private car and light), green (for business use), black. In addition, I have also supports transparent setting of the plate. · There is one area in which the upper and lower of the license plate, to display the number. For each, you will be able to display which of the remaining battery capacity battery temperature, battery voltage, be assigned to any. Kanji of the upper, can be selected "battery" "balance", "temperature" and "voltage". You can also depending on the charging status and switch "charge", "power supply (AC connection)", "communication (USB connection)" to automatically. Hiragana of lower likewise "(battery) te" "(remaining) is" You can select "Contact (temperature)", "Oh (voltage)" from "(battery) is". You can depending on the charging status, to switch "to (charge)," "For (AC connection)", "yu (USB connection)" to automatically. ■ Installation 1. Open the setting screen by long press on the home screen, and then select the "widgets". 2. Please select a "license plate battery" from the list. ■ How to set When you tap the widget that you installation, configuration screen opens.
release_text: Ver1.2アップデート ・ナンバープレートの色を追加（ピンク・水色） ・一部の機種で正しく表示されない不具合を改善 ・ヘルプ画面の内容を修正 Ver1.21アップデート ・一部の機種でウィジェットサイズが３×２になる不具合を修正

description: Enjoy one of the original, and most accurate, Horoscope apps for Android, now with more readings and advice than ever before. With Express Horoscopes v2.0, in addition to daily horoscope readings and celebrity birthdays, you can access: • Dear Eugenia Daily Horoscope and Weekly Horoscope Readings- The Ancient Art of Astrology is the Modern Art of Timing and no one is a greater Timing scientist than Eugenia Last. Eugenia, guided by the art and science of the stars, helps readers navigate their lives and their loves. • Lovescope- Eugenia Last's Weekly astrological look at romance, filling you in on if you’re love life is heating up or cooling down. • Instant Sign Access – Choose your astrological sign and always have your personal horoscope content ready for you. • Dynamic Home Screen Widget – Instant access to your latest horoscope readings right from your home screen. Express Horoscopes is one of the original astrological guides for Android and has earned the reputation for outstanding accuracy. Take a look at what users have been saying about Express Horoscopes: “I absolutely love your app!!! Tonight, I read my horoscope out loud to my boyfriend and the very last sentence of my horoscope said, “Love is in the air,” and he smiles one of the biggest smiles I have ever seen on his face! He says, "Wow, those things are pretty accurate, don’t you think?" I looked over and started to say something and he’s by my side, ON HIS KNEE, asking me to marry him! I said, "YESSSSS, OF COURSE, OF COURSE!" I feel like your app gave my soon to be husband that just enough push to ask for my hand! So thank you!” - Victoria “These horoscopes are right on point, everyday. I thought it was just coincidence until I started reading horoscopes to my friends every day. Everybody LOVES your horoscopes! I can't go a day without my reading!” - Michelle “UNBELIEVABLE!!! I'm so freakin out over today’s Capricorn reading & more! The signs appeared on my phone while we were waiting 4 something 2 install & I first read my 5 year old’s to him & then I read mine & BLEW ME AWAY IT WAS LIKE A WELL NEEDED PEP TALK FROM A THERAPIST. I'VE READ MY HOROSCOPE THROUGH ALL THESE YEARS & even have books. I've always been into mine & others around me readings & this one IS THE MOST ACCURATE ONE I'VE EVER READ. WOW!!! I want one of those fortune telling readings BADLY!!!!” - Lori
release_text: V2.1.0.2 General Product Enhancements and Bug Fixes V2.1 Daily Horoscope notifications now available! Link to "Ask Eugenia" anything and everything. Added Yearly Horoscopes v2.0 Addition of Eugenia Last's Horoscope and Lovescope readings. Complete graphic overhaul. Marked as "Horoscopes" in app drawer. Ability to remove ads with Express Horoscopes Premium option. Compatibility for all Android devices 2.1 and up

description: From the very beginning, man has been a hunter. Now, you are about to become the hunted! Battle your way through hungry dinosaurs like raptors, pterodactyls, the mighty Tyrannosaurus Rex and more. Kill or be eaten while using clubs, rocks, spears and bows. Use fire-tipped or broad head arrows on the greatest predators ever to stalk the earth. As you progress, you can purchase more and deadlier weapons. But this is no simple hunt. Boltar, an evil caveman, has kidnapped your mate and a rescue must be mounted. Between you and the island where she is being held are many flesh eating dinosaurs, waiting to feast on your body, not to mention traps laid by Boltar. Immersive 3D graphics Explore an entire island in every direction Upgrade your weapons as you progress Use healing herbs to restore your health In the real world, of course, prehistoric man and dinosaurs did not exist at the same time; they were separated by tens of millions of years. In TRex Hunt, however, the two are thrust together in a battle for survival. If your primitive weaponry skills can overcome the raw strength of the many tyrannosaurs you encounter, you will live another day. Watch real gameplay action on Youtube if you dare: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8vx1Z82ouhg TRex Hunt was created from the chronicles of Tim Wells, the world’s greatest primitive weapons hunter. Learn more about him and enter to win cash and prizes at www.timwellsbowhunter.com. What our downloaders are saying: Jason W - Love this app! – “Not a usual gamer but if they were all like this I would be!!! Great graphics and very addictive.” Zach Pritchard - Game was awesome! – “The game has the best graphics out of any app I have played! Game play was fast with no glitches or ads. The weapons are awesome!” Bob Ackerman – Fun game! – “Really fun. Some of the best graphics you can find in the app store. You get to go back in time and feel like a real caveman!” Cody Smith – AWESOME!!!! - “Trex hunter is great! Its real life graphics and quality image makes it seems like you’re drawing the bow back yourself and launching a rage at those prehistoric beast that are after you! Download now!” Please email us directly if you have any questions/concerns/feedback about the game hunt@worldhuntinggroup.com . Supported Resolutions: 800x480,854x480,960x540,1024x600,1280x720,1280x800
release_text: Improved loading time. Support for 1024x600, 1280x800 resolutions. Bugfixes.

description: Symantec Validation ID Protection (VIP) Access helps protect your online accounts and transactions. VIP Access provides simple, strong authentication when you sign in to your VIP-enabled accounts. VIP Access lets you add strong authentication to your normal login in one of the following ways: • Dynamically generate a one-time use security code on your mobile device. Enter that code along with your username and password. • Receive a push notification on your mobile device that you approve as authentication. • Use your VIP PIN in a push notification to authenticate yourself on your mobile device. Note: The strong authentication method you use depends on the method implemented by your participating organization. Use VIP Access at participating organizations such as eBay, PayPal, E*TRADE, or any one of the hundreds of sites within the VIP Network: https://idprotect.vip.symantec.com/wheretouse.v Be sure to read the VIP End User Agreement after downloading VIP Access: http://www.symantec.com/content/en/us/about/media/repository/vip-access-client-eula-en.pdf
release_text: VIP Access has a new flat design. Also, you can now use your VIP PIN to authenticate yourself from your mobile device.

description: Zoom, a 2014 Gartner Cool Vendor, unifies cloud video conferencing, simple online meetings, and group messaging into one easy-to-use application. Start or join a 25-person meeting with crystal-clear, face-to-face conversation, high quality screen sharing, and instant messaging – anytime, anywhere, on your Android device. It's super easy: install the free Zoom app, click on "Host a Meeting" and invite up to 25 people to join! Key Features: --Best Android video meeting quality --Best Android screen sharing quality --Screen share from Android device --Screen share photos, web and Google Drive, Dropbox or Box files --Send group text, images and audio from mobile and desktop --Contact availability status --Easily invite phone, email or company contacts --Join as interactive participant or view-only webinar attendee --Works over WiFi, 4G/LTE and 3G networks --Safe driving mode while on the road --Connect with anyone on Android, Windows, Mac, iOS, ZoomPresence, H.323/SIP room systems, and telephone
release_text: - Support sending any file via Zoom from other apps; - Swipe to view all images in one message session; - User can select a time zone in meeting scheduler; - Other bug fixes.

description: The GoFlex Access™ app allows you to remotely access all the photos, movies, music and documents stored on your GoFlex Home network storage system. Simply launch the app and login to access your files and shares from anywhere when connected to Wi-Fi or 3G/4G. -Access your files stored at home from anywhere you have a Wi-Fi or 3G/4G connection -View your photos -Create a slideshows with music -Share your documents -Stream videos and music with cover art Requires Android 2.2 and Adobe AIR.
release_text: Version 2.1.34 - File upload functionality - Prompt user option to download file if video format is not -supported bug fixes - Performance improvements when navigating through folders - Improve robustness of login

description: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz is a children's novel written by L. Frank Baum and illustrated by W. W. Denslow. Originally published by the George M. Hill Company in Chicago on May 17, 1900,[nb 1] it has since been reprinted numerous times, most often under the name The Wizard of Oz, which is the name of both the 1902 stage play and the 1939 film version. The story chronicles the adventures of a girl named Dorothy in the Land of Oz. Thanks in part to the 1939 MGM movie, it is one of the best-known stories in American popular culture and has been widely translated. Its initial success, and the success of the popular 1902 Broadway musical Baum adapted from his story, led to Baum's writing thirteen more Oz books.

Aplikace Atlas hub Free je originální průvodce světem hub, jejich sběrem, poznáváním a chováním. Jak už název napovídá, jedná se o atlas hub rozdělený do kategorií (jedlé, jedovaté atd.), optimalizovaný pro jednoduché a rychlé užívání. Aplikace vznikala ve spolupráci s členy České mykologické společnosti. * Atlas hub (více než 140 druhů) * Kategorie - jedlé, jedovaté, exotické, zdravé a léčivé * První pomoc s možností přímého volání na linku první pomoci a toxikologie Obsahuje prostor pro reklamní sdělení. Třeba narazíte i na něco jiného, než na houby... http://youtu.be/MeFxKyNP0zE Atlas Free Application hub is the original guide to the world of mushrooms, collecting, exploring and behavior. As the name suggests, it is a hub atlas divided into categories (edible, poisonous, etc.), optimized for fast and easy use. Applications written in collaboration with members of the Czech Mycological Society. * Atlas hub (over 140 species) * Category - edible, poisonous, exotic, healthy and active * First aid with a direct call to the emergency number and Toxicology Includes space for advertising message. Maybe you come on something other than the mushrooms ... http://youtu.be/MeFxKyNP0zE

description: Are you already looking forward to the FIFA World Cup 2014 in Brazil? Now that we know which 32 football nations will be on the quest for global domination in Brazil, Zakeb decided it was the right time to release an app for Android. The Football World cup 2014 Schedule application, which is free of charge, provides fans with access to a ton of footie-related stuff, including news, videos, photos and match results from league, quarter final and semifinal matches, so you'll be able to see in real-time what road lies ahead for your country. The Football World Cup Schedule app captures the spectacle of the tournament perfectly and is fun to play too. Find reviews, match dates, news, picture and image gallery, and more. Football World Cup Schedule's superb presentation makes it the best-looking Football world cup app yet. It has a range of engaging content, promotions and information so that those fans can experience the World Cup in unique and fun ways. The app contains a specialist section for the World Cup, allowing users to zoom into important information such as World Cup 2014 group standings and of course a full World Cup 2014 fixture list including start times and date. What you’ll personally love about the app, is that it displays kick-off times in your local time. This gives you a perfect heads-up on how to prepare for the matches this summer, ensuring that you won’t miss a game since the information is just a few clicks away on your personal app. Features: - Exhilarating and intriguing graphics - Easy navigation - All Information regarding - Useful information such as World Cup 2014 group standing. - A full World Cup 2014 fixture list including start times and date. - Displays kick-off times in your local time. - completely free

(Voice issue) (1) In app, Click FAQ in menu button or screen of Notification App (2) Disable all of TTS-related app on the below in FAQ screen. 2) If it doesn't work sometimes, Try to turn the power off and then on. 3) Setup info for GoSMS, HandcentSMS, third party SMS apps - Add to Notification App, because they prevent original SMS message event. With Gallery Feature With Phone Call Control With Alarm Control With System RAM Cleaner WINNER at INTEL CodeFest 2013 Air Control allows you to control following features: 1. Air Gallery - Control your Images using Air Gallery - Wave once for Next Image - Wave twice for Previous Image 2. Music - Control your music player using Air Gesture Control - Place and remove your hand (Hover) to play music - Place and remove your hand (Hover) again to pause music - Wave once to play Next song - Wave twice to play Previous song 3. Unlock Screen - Control your phone screen UnLock using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to UnLock your screen 4. Record Audio - Record audio data using Air Gesture Control - Place and remove your hand to start recording Audio - Place and remove your hand again to Stop recording Audio - Your recorded file would inside /sdcard/AirGestureControl/DateTime.mp3 5. Push Ups - Select PushUp check box using Air Gesture Control - Place your phone below your chest and start doing PushUps - When done with workout, remove PushUp check box 6. Flash Light (Torch) - Control your phone Flash Light using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on Flash light(Torch) - Place and remove your hand again to switch off Flash light(Torch) 7. Ringer Volume (Silent mode) - Control your phone volume using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to Silent phone - Place and remove your hand again to Ringer mode your phone 8. WiFi - Control your phone WiFi using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on WiFi - Place and remove your hand again to switch off WiFi 9. Data Connection - Control your phone data connection using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on Data Connection - Place and remove your hand again to switch off Data Connection 10. GPS - Control your phone GPS using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on GPS - Place and remove your hand again to switch off GPS 11. Bluetooth Get all of these awesome features on your phone now. How It Works: Air Gesture Control is a PROXIMITY sensor based application. Every phone has this sensor to switch off screen when talking over phone Proximity Controls: 1. Hovering - Place your hand over Proximity sensor and remove your hand. 2. Wave Once - Wave within the range of Proximity sensor quickly once 3. Wave Twice - Wave within the range of Proximity sensor quickly one after other, two times Great for: Driving - Focus only on driving, safety first Press Conference- Wave and record while others are searching for a way to record PushUps - Use Air Gesture Control to keep track of your push ups At your desk - No need to look at your phone, change to next song by waving Cooking - Hands covered with oil, well just wave at your phone for next song Cleaning - Don't worry about getting dirt on your phone Eating - No more food stain on your phone screen Working Out- Don't fall off the treadmill while changing to next song Show off - Well be a Ninja, Jedi or Shaolin monk, take your pick **IMPORTANT** Air Gesture Control is tested on HTC, Samsung, Sony, LG, Micromax, Karbonn, Lenovo and Lava phones If there is a problem, please email me at intankcorp@gmail.com and give me a chance to figure it out before leaving a bad review! Known Issues: If your phone/Tablet does not have PROXIMITY sensor, Air Gesture Control will not work on your device. :( Permissions Needed: Bluetooth: To switch on Bluetooth Camera: To switch on Flash Light (Torch) Microphone: To record Audio data Storage: To store recorded Audio data Network communication: To switch on WiFi Tags: Air Control, Wave Control, Proximity Control, Proximity Sensor Developed on HTC ONE X
release_text: V 1.6 New design Minor bug fix V 1.3 Clear System RAM just by Waving your hand Many Notification Icons to choose from Vibrate Mode V 1.2 - Alarm Control V 1.1 - Silent incoming call - Turn to speaker phone when removed phone from ear - Notification on Last Registered Gesture

description: ‘Calcudoku(Mathdoku)’ - More Than 1,00,00,00,00,00,000+ Calcudoku or Mathdoku puzzles A perfect Calcudoku or Mathdoku is here for all sudoku lovers with amazing 4 different difficulty options i.e. 'Intermediate','Challenging','Tough' and 'Expert'. Options 1 to 4 varies from very simple, easy to hard and toughest game play. The game is similar to Sudoku but uses a little math. Thick lines indicate 'cages'. Each cage has an arithmetic puzzle which must be solved by the digits in the cage. e.g. '8+' means all digits in that cage add to 8. The order in which digits are used is irrelevant Features- 1) 4 difficulty options with 1,00,00,00,00,00,000+ Calcudoku or Mathdoku puzzles 2) Different grid sizes - 5x5, 6x6, 7x7,8x8,9x9 3) Pencil marks with auto fill / erase 4) Undo and Redo 5) Intelligent hints 6) Selected digit highlighting 7) Incorrect entry highlighting So get ready to be puzzled...

“School Diary”, makes parent-school communication easy, engaging and effective. School Diary provides a single interface, a mobile app, for all the communications that happen between a parent, admin and teacher. Communication between a parent & teacher (or admin) is always private and secure and is not visible to any other parent/user. School Diary enables schools & parents to go paperless for all their communication needs thus helping them make a significant contributing towards our mother nature. The key features of School Diary are - a. Instant & private messaging. Messages can be sent one to one or in a group to parents. Push notifications are instantly sent to parents informing about an incoming messages. b. A multimedia messaging platform that enables schools to engage parents at right moments; Messages can be text, pictures, PDFs or voice messages. So school can now share classroom activity pictures, audio of child singing & important announcements with parents instantly on their phone. b. A calendar that not only allows parent to view the roadmap but also reminds them on key activities at the right moments. c. Attendance that helps schools easily capture and share attendance with parents d. A scheduling option that schools can use to send pre-composed messages to parent. They can just select schedule for every message and see those messages delivered at their scheduled time to the selected parents. f. Daycare module to keep parents informed about their child’s daily progress & activities. g. Transport module that helps parents track the bus, get route and ETA to their stop. And much more.. * School Diary is only available for registered schools. Please check with your school admin or contact us at app@ufony.com if your school is not registered yet. * Parents can get in touch with their school admin for login and other details.
release_text: In this latest build you can - 1) Tracker module that helps parents track buses. 2) Event reminders for next day events. 3) Bug fixes

description: “It’s blisteringly cruel (...) Undeniably engaging and fun.” ~ John Walker (Rock, Paper, Shotgun) Faif is a puzzle/rpg game with a unique battle system based on gambling. HOW TO PLAY IT After choosing 5 adjacent tiles you only get one! Play wisely with the odds and defeat your enemies before they defeat you. FEATURES * Unique gameplay * Epic “odd” battles * No IAP's whatsoever * A nice shop with kickass powerups (use gems you collect in the game as payment) * Infinite mode (survive as many opponents as you can) * Multiplayer! * Supports phone, tablets, and almost every smart thingie out there! “Faif is definitely one of the more unique puzzle RPG games I’ve experienced so far” ~ (AppAdvice) “Faif carries an undeniable “one more time” quality that drives players to beat their winning streaks” ~ (148apps.com) “The game looks utterly gorgeous, with a papery feel to proceedings that sort of makes it feel like you’re shuffling little bits of hand-crafted art around“ ~ (PocketGamer.co.uk) “It’s a game that looks like a puzzle from one angle, an RPG from another — but it’s its own creature.“ ~ Owen Faraday (Pocket Tactics) “Faif offers a unique twist on the match-3 — or 5 in this case — genre, and spices up its RPG mechanics with a hint of gambling“ ~ Lee Cooper (Hardcore Gamer) ___________________________________ Faif site → http://beavl.com/faif/post.html +1 us! → https://plus.google.com/+Beavl Like us! → http://facebook.com/beavlgames Follow us! → http://twitter.com/beavlgames

Cleared - all you need to do is clear the board! Match 3 or more dots to clear them from the board. 240 challenging levels. More are coming soon. Switch between colored dots or bring new dots from the queue to the board. For every dot you add, the game will add its own to mess a little with your plans, or give a little unexpected help :) Match 3 or more dots of the same color to remove those nasty taints from your board. score more for successive matches. Each level introduces a new, unique board with challenging conditions to meet. Remove all taints and beat the conditions to clear the level. Advance in rank as you solve more puzzles, to become the Cleared Master! Unlike other games, luck has no major role in Cleared. You control most of what happens on the board and almost all levels can be solved regardless of the game counter play. but you need to plan carefully, as you have only 5 lives to spare. in some levels, every move counts! Cleared is an addictive and challenging puzzle game. Easy to control, fun to play, hard to win! Note, Cleared is free to play. However, there are some in-game items such as extra lives or moves that requires payment. you can turn off payments by disabling in-app purchases on your device's settings. Cleared is a wonderful puzzle game for all ages. Enjoy a new challenging and engaging game in a familiar theme. If you liked flow max, you are sure to enjoy this new and unique game in the janre. app_name: Bắt Chữ - Duoi Hinh Bat Chu
description: Bắt Chữ là một trò chơi thú vị, thuộc thể loại "đuổi hình bắt chữ" đầy trí tuệ nhưng cũng ngập tràn thư giãn. Bắt Chữ với kho dữ liệu phong phú, hấp dẫn, đa dạng, ở nhiều lĩnh vực. Nội dung câu đố đặc sắc thú vị, phù hợp với tất cả mọi người, đem lại cho bạn những giây phút thư giãn sảng khoái. Thật hứng khởi khi tự mình khám phá những tầng ý nghĩa đặc sắc, hài hước, vui nhộn, bất ngờ, thú vị, mới lạ,... của các câu chữ ẩn đằng sau những hình ảnh quen thuộc. Bạn có thể sẽ không nhịn được cười khi mở ra các đáp án, những khuôn ảnh tưởng chừng như không liên quan, nhưng khi ghép lại với nhau, lại tạo thành những câu chữ kỳ thú. Bắt Chữ - khó mà dễ, dễ mà khó. Để vượt qua hết các câu hỏi, bạn cần có các kiến thức cả về tiếng Việt, Hán Việt, thậm chí cả tiếng Anh. Dải tri thức trải rộng từ các đồ vật thường dùng, đến địa lý, thể thao, danh nhân, lô đề, ... So với một số game cùng thể loại "đuổi hình bắt chữ" khác đã và đang tồn tại, bản game "Bắt Chữ" mới này có gì đặc sắc và khác biệt? Đầu tiên, đó là cách chơi cực kỳ đơn giản, kế thừa kiểu thao tác của game 4-pics-1-word nổi tiếng: không cần mô tả gợi ý, không cần mở bàn phím nhập chữ, không cần hạn chế thời gian. Thứ hai, đó là bộ hình ảnh được chăm chút rực rỡ sinh động, bạn chắc chắn sẽ không tìm ra một game nào tương tự có bộ dữ liệu đẹp hơn! Game là miễn phí! Khi gặp một từ mà không có trong kho tri thức của bạn, bạn có thể dùng điểm thưởng trong game để mở từ này. Hãy tận hưởng niềm vui, sự sảng khoái, và những bất ngờ thú vị với "Bắt Chữ"! Knowledge strip extending from the commonly used objects, to geography, sports, celebrity, plot threads, ... description: ** This is not an official app by ArenaNet This app uses the GW2 API to collect data in regards to the World versus World. Simple native android app User Interface to facilitate an easy way of monitoring the status of WvW. The status will auto refresh base on user defined timer. Please email me if you encounter any issues, any feedback or any suggestions. You can also pm me in game at "Sc Ar Z" without the quotes. Available Features - Selection of Server - Auto Refresh - Selection of Refresh timing - Simple, Clean, easy to use User Interface - Keep Screen Turn On (No Screensaver), can be turned off What you need to know The app uses simple colors to show you the situation in WvW. The 3 worlds is shown by Red, Green and Blue. For the 3 Borderlands, the orientation of the objects is similar to what you see in the game. For Eternal Battleground, due to lack of space, the orientation is from top to bottom, Red World, Green World, Blue World. Additionally when a Castle, Keep, Tower or Camp is under Righteous Indignation, there will be a YELLOW bar on top of the object with a timer. Features to be implemented - Better colors for different worlds and text - Better orientation for the objects in EB - Indication of attack on objects

Funmotion provides fun and easy way to create your stop motion clip. Tap and hold to record your video, and use it repeatedly to create your sequences. Simply click the tick button when you are ready and have your clip ready. Quick, simple, fun and easy. Explore your creativity and share your clip with your friends. How to use fun motion? - Tap and hold anywhere on the screen to record your video - Tap repeatedly to create sequences - When you are done, tap the tick button on the right to finalise your clip You can also create lapse alike video by tapping your screen faster. The duration of your tap decides the frame rate for your stop motion video. Happy exploring! Legal: - This application uses openCV library licensed under the BSD License and its source can be downloaded here: http://opencv.org/ - This application uses libraries from the FFmpeg project under the LGPLv2.1 ( http://www.ffmpeg.org/ )

A pack of widgets inspired by the hit Japanese anime Sword Art Online (SAO). Requires UCCW to function How to Use 1. Install Ultimate custom widget (UCCW) from the Play Store ( http://goo.gl/33y9P ) 2. Install the Sword Art Online UCCW Widgets pack on this page 3. Create a UCCW widget on your homescreen, choose desired dimensions (feel free to experiment!) 4. Select desired SAO widget from the list ***If you do not see the SAO widgets in the list, please restart your device*** 5. Open UCCW and turn on "Hotspot Mode" for widget functionality (Menu Button -> Settings -> Lock Widgets) Changing or removing hotspot (touch) functionality on the widgets 1. Place the widget on your homescreen 2. Turn OFF Hotspot Mode in UCCW 3. Tap on your widget on the homescreen again 4. UCCW will open in edit mode for the selected widget (see 3rd screenshot) 5. Tap on the hotspot you want to change and clear/change the associated action Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Q: Tapping on any widget opens up UCCW! A: Please ensure Hotspot Mode is turned ON in UCCW (Menu Button -> Settings -> Lock Widgets) Q: How can I change the text/name on the battery HP bar? A: UCCW does not yet allow end-users to customize static text elements Q: The widgets are not translucent like in the anime! A: This is to accommodate the irregular-shaped HP bar, and for visibility improvements on different backgrounds This UCCW Widget Pack currently includes the following * Each widget comes with dark and light variations and has customizable hotspots - [4x1] HP Battery Bar - [2x1] Clock - [2x1] Battery Status (Charging/Discharging) Work in Progress - Calendar - Weather Special Thanks darkblackswords@DA - For the fabulous SAO Font

description: - When you get an incoming call, Call Locations will display the location of the caller based on their area code. For example, if you get a call from 212-111-1111 the app will display: New York, New York. - See a list of all your contacts and the location of their area code. - The app also saves your location whenever you dial, receive, or miss a call. This is extremely helpful for remembering what a call was about. - You can add notes about a call. - View statistics about your call history. - Receive notifications when a call event happens. The caller's location is based off their phone number's area code. Keywords: area code locations, caller location ** Caller location is only available in the US, Great Britain, Canada, Germany, Egypt, Brazil, and India. I am working hard at getting other countries soon.
release_text: - Egypt, Germany, Brazil and Great Britain support added! - Contact Locations - view the location of all your contact's phone numbers - Improved location accuracy - General bug fixes

description: ★ Forum Runner is in the Top 20 Social apps on Google Play! ★ ★ Forum Runner has over 7,500 forums listed in its network and is growing daily! ★ Forum Runner allows you to browse your favorite forums the way they were meant to be on Android devices. With Forum Runner you no longer have to worry about waiting on the entire forum web page to load up in Chrome - it only loads the actual forum information, which loads much faster. You can log into the forums and post in them as you normally would in Safari. Forum Runner supports vBulletin, phpBB, XenForo, myBB, and IP.Board! We are adding support for other forums in the future. ★★★ If you do not see your favorite forums on Forum Runner, please ask the forum administrator to install the plug-in (this takes less than 5 minutes). They can download the plugin from http://www.forumrunner.com . ★★★ Forum Runner is more feature-packed and cheaper than any of its competition! Full version of Forum Runner features: ★ Full support for Push notifications! description: A Flippy Goal - Impossible Game is the new free soccer game of this year 2014. And it's also the craziest one! Kick the ball, face the craziest and most evil soccer goal of all time and climb the leaderboards among your friends to be the best player ever . More than just sport. A real challenge ----------------------------------------------- This is not a typical app of penalty kicks or playing with your club. Easy soccer games are for losers. This is harder, really much harder and you're alone. If you want to win you will have to control your speed and immerse yourself in the adventure of this action challenge. Who needs a trophy when you can have the satisfaction of crushing your opponent? Compare your score with your friends ----------------------------------------------- We know how hard it is to win this game. So if you do, you'll want to share it with your friends on Twitter so they can see your progress in the Google Play Games leaderboards. It's cool to be the best. Really cool. You'll want to smash this football goal. For real --------------------------------------------------- Or burn it, shoot it or make it go away. You will want to kick it instead of kicking the ball. Experience the rage in your veins, get angry , get out of your nerves and forget everything you know about soccer. No players. No coaches nor managers. No cups nor trophies. No league nor seasons, there's not even a match. Only one ball, you and your archenemy the evil goal. Can you keep your head cool or will this goal drive you crazy ? Test yourself ------------------------------ Don't watch videos on Youtube . Do not let them tell you about it. Try it for yourself and experience the ultimate game. You dare?

GPS location-tracking tool for your outdoor-activities OpenStreetMap / MapQuest ★ FEATURES OVERVIEW ★ • Maps (default, cycling, public transport) • Location storage (layer based) • GPS tracking (with statistics) • Compass (with Augmented reality mode) • Distance measurement • Geocoding (reverse, GPS coordinates) • Altimeter ★ MAPS Choose between different types of maps (Default, Cycle, Transport). Maps datasource is powered by OpenStreetMap-data with tiles courtesy of MapQuest. ★ LOCATION STORAGE Store your geolocation-favorites, arranged on different layers, which can be hidden/displayed on the fly. Set up a custom map-indicator (select a color + icon) for your geolocation-layer. Quick navigation from one location to another is easy via management-area next/below the map. You can even take geolocation photos to be stored with each of the locations. ★ GPS TRACKING With the tracking feature you're able to record your trips. Detailed statistics about distance, duration, speed,.. are easily shown. Recorded tracks can be hidden/displayed on the fly. You can even stop recording, and resume later, even at another point... ★ COMPASS A small compass-overlay can be displayed on the map. Your devices gyroscope (if available) is used to stabilize azimuth-measurement. The built-in augmented reality feature allows to target remote locations and show distances/direction to stored location. ★ DISTANCE MEASUREMENT Measure linear distances from your position to another, or even between to remote points. ★ REVERSE GEOCODING Your exact location is shown on the map. GPS coordinates and actual address information is shown next to the map. ★ ALTIMETER Your current altitude is shown (optional, if gps enabled) in the statusbar next to/below the map. Altitude is determined from gps-data. ★ PORTRAIT / LANDSCAPE This app can be used on your demands in portrait and landscape mode. ★ DATASTORAGE All recorded positions and tracks are stored locally (on your device). Pictures don't mess up your devices picture-galery as they are only accessible from inside the app. ★ HOW TO manage layers, geolocations, track log records Below the map (on the left side in landscape) you can see a moveable statusbar. Move it up (to the right in landscape) until the management-area comes into view. The management-area contains 3 pages (slidable horizontally). On the first page ('LAYERS') you can add layers as a container for locations / geopoints * Click 'Add new layers' at lists bottom to add new ones * Press-and-hold existing list-items to edit/delete * Click item to toggle visibility of layer's locations / geopoints * Click '+' button to add new locations / geopoints (placed at current map's center) On the second page ('LOCATIONS') you can see all currently visible locations * Click to quick-center on map * Press-and-hold to edit/delete On the third page ('TRACKS') you can manage your track log records * Click 'Add new track' at lists bottom to add new track logs * Click on newly created track items to toggle recording-state (paused <-> recording) * Click on 'Finish' button to finalize track-log recording * Click on finalized item to toggle visibility on map * Click 'Center-Arrow' button to quick-center track / route ★ PRO UPGRADE The free version has a limited number of layers, locations and tracks you can add. You can upgrade to an ad-free and unlimited version any time. Location storage, GPS tracking, Compass, Distance measurement, Altimeter - all rolled into one!
