description: *** Version gratuite *** mobiBrevet accompagne les élèves de Troisième dans la dernière ligne droite avant les épreuves du Brevet. Le contenu est adapté au support et à un usage en temps limité pour faciliter les révisions entre deux cours, dans les transports, etc. Pour chaque matière, l’élève dispose : • de fiches de révision concises avec des tableaux synthétiques, des récapitulatifs sur les points principaux du programme ; • en Français, d'un module de dictées ; • en Maths, Histoire, Géographie et Éducation civique, de résumés de cours audio d’une à deux minutes sur les points principaux du programme ; • d’un lexique des concepts clés ; • de séries de tests permettant de s’évaluer sur un ou plusieurs points du programme ; • de conseils méthodologiques sur les épreuves et l’organisation des révisions. Il peut également accéder à : • des conseils santé et bien-être ; • des succès à débloquer au fur et à mesure de son avancement ; • et surtout un module de révisions en temps limité pour adapter ses révisions en fonction d’une durée donnée (5 min, 10 min, etc.). *** *** Free version mobiBrevet accompanies students in third in the run-up to the Patent of events. The content is tailored to support and use in limited time to facilitate revisions between classes, transportation, etc. For each subject, the student has: • concise flashcards with summary tables, summary of the main points of the program; • French, a dictation module; • Maths, History, Geography and Civics, course summaries audio of two minutes on the main points of the program; • a glossary of key concepts; • series of tests to evaluate themselves on one or more aspects of the program; • methodological advice on the organization of events and revisions. It can also access: • Health and wellness tips; • success to unlock as it progresses; • and above all a time-limited revisions module to adapt its revisions function for a given duration (5 min, 10 min, etc.).

This plugin provides contour lines and hillshade which can be displayed in OsmAnd's offline maps. * To download hillshade and contour lines map : Settings → Download Data → Hillshade/Contour Lines * To enable hillshade layer online maps plugin should be enabled and hillshade should be selected as underlay layer * Latest update : download functionality is fixed (New OsmAnd is required) * The global data (between 70 degrees north and 70 degrees south) is based on measurements by SRTM (Shuttle Radar Topography Mission) and ASTER (Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer), an imaging instrument onboard Terra, the flagship satellite of NASA's Earth Observing System. ASTER is a cooperative effort between NASA, Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI), and Japan Space Systems (J-spacesystems).
release_text: * Make plugin available for tablets * Fixed download functionality * Contour lines enabled immediately after download * Added Hillshade data

Olive is a Mobile VoIP dialer application that allows to make VoIP calls from any of the Android devices and it uses 3G/Edge/Wi-Fi Internet connectivity.It is developed based on the requirements of VoIP Providers business needs Features :- It uses SIP protocol based for signaling. Supports G729,PCMU, PCMA codecs. Runs Behind NAT or private IP. User Friendly Interface. Auto Sync of Balance. Real Time Sip status messages. Call History. Address book integration. Compatible with all sip standard switches. It has very efficient implementation of jitter buffer to play voice smoothly. Silent suppression and comfort noise generation has been used to reduce the bandwidth usage, and this makes the dialer more efficient in making VoIP calls. Integrates with mobiles phonebook and auto detects (+) sign when contact is picked from phonebook.

Getting you to doing 10, 15, 20 or 25 pull ups in a row -- that is what the Pull Ups fitness app is all about. Just like a real personal fitness trainer, the Pull Ups app adjusts the exercise regimen based on your feedback how taxing you think the individual exercises are. Remember the Star Trek computer? It's finally happening--with Wolfram|Alpha. Attach contacts to your emails just like any other file. Have you ever started to write an email and then realized that you want to attach the contact information of someone in your People (contacts) app? Only to then find out that the "attach" button in your email client won't offer you to select a contact. Okay, now… • close the draft • exit the email app • open the People app • open a contact • press "Share" • select the email app • and type the text again Too complicated? I agree! That's why I made this little app to allow you to attach contacts directly from the email app. • While composing an email, select the "attach" action. • When asked what type of attachment you want to add, select "Attach a contact". • Finally, select the contact whose information you want to attach in the VCARD (.vcf) file format. Works with… • Gmail • Email • K-9 Mail • Kaiten Mail • MailDroid • … and most likely every other email app. If this app doesn't work for you, please drop me a line using the "email developer" link in the Play store.

Capture, edit and share screenshots on the go Ashampoo Snap for Android is a fully-fledged mobile application to capture, edit and share screenshots and images on your Android device. Capture screen contents, take photos with your built-in camera or simply load existing images and add stylable arrows, shapes, stamps and texts to get your point across. And when you're finished, share your images through any installed file services (EMail, Picasa, Google+, etc.). Save and store what you see Imagine you are browsing Facebook and come across a hilarious post or chat message that could very well be the next epic chat fail. Just take a screenshot and remove sensitive information with Snap for Android and come back to it later. Record and document unforeseen events on the spot Don't just rely on your memory alone! Use Snap for Android to record and document unfavorable situations such as car crashes and add arrows and notes to detail the sequence of events that caused them. Record thoughts and ideas right in your photos Snap for Android gives you a set of creative tools to draw and write on your images. Enhance your vacation snaps and tell your friends exactly where your room was during your last stay or which places you particularly liked on that beach. Just mark the spots right in your photos with Snap for Android. Share images with anyone Use the integrated Ashampoo Web upload and share unique Internet links with others. Your images will be accessible through any web browser and automatically expire after 30 days so your images won't stay online forever. Of course, Snap for Android also supports all built-in sharing capabilities including Facebook and Google+. Capture •Instant-ready: No manual launching required (background service) •Notification Bar status messages •Smart trigger: Screenshots taken through Android-default hardware key combination auto-open in Snap for Android •System integration: Use "Open with Snap" in other apps, import and edit images through Gallery, take and modify camera snapshots Edit •Pan/Zoom •Draw arrows •Draw rectangle/ellipse/line shapes •Stamps (cliparts) •Marker •Pen •Add text •Crop image •Scale canvas •Shadow/outline support: Arrows, Texts, rectangles, ellipses, lines Share •Set edited images as wallpaper in launcher •Supports all installed sharing capabilities (Facebook, Google+, Picasa, Twitter etc.) •No ads •Image scaling supported •AshWeb upload: Upload images to AshWeb and share unique links •Enable/disable Notification Bar messages •Many additional stamps/cliparts FAQ: http://www.ashampoo.com/lpa/snap4android_help

Created with teachers for teachers, parents and non-profits to quickly level books by either scanning the ISBN barcode of a book or entering the full title of the book. (Keyboard or voice input) UPC BARCODES ARE RETAIL STORE BARCODES AND NOT ISBN #'s and will NOT WORK with this app. This time effective tool allows you to quickly level, sort and create leveled libraries in your classrooms, or to select an appropriate book for your children at a bookstore, library or garage sale. Most School Districts and school PTA's will reimburse the cost of this app. Upon scanning the ISBN or entering the book title: the Grade Level Equivalent, Lexile Measure, DRA Level and Guided Reading Level are provided, along with a picture of the book cover. Our app also provides a listing of local public libraries in your area that have the book in stock. The database of books that are leveled consists of 850,000+books and counting. As an additional benefit, this app is recommended to parents to allow them to make informed decisions when purchasing "just right books" for their children. Most educators are always looking for ideas to save time. This app takes away the cumbersome task of typing in each book title to use many random sources to level books for students. Users need to download a free companion barcode scanner app in order to use the barcode scan option. Our voice/keyboard title input option is the preferred and fastest option based on Direct user feedback. It is user friendly and saves the teachers, parents & non-profits many hours when leveling book libraries. Save time when leveling books or book leveling, and your classroom leveled library will be the envy of other teachers and your students will be leveled readers who can read Leveled Books.

description: Farm Animal Sounds for Kids - entertain your toddler with with pictures and sounds of adorable farm animals. Designed especially for toddlers 1.5 to 5 years, this exciting and educational game will teach your kids names of farm animals and their sounds. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a farm animal is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture of a correct animal. The pictures are big and colorful so it is easy for your kid's small fingers to touch it, but at the beginning your assistance might be helpful for younger children. Featuring HD cartoony graphics of adorable animals and real farm animal sounds this game guarantees a lot of fun for your lovely kids! Made by Mommy and Daddy and tested by their lovely daughter! Main features: - Sweet, cartoony graphics of farm kid animals, - Real, high quality sounds of farm animals, - 2 difficulty levels - endless mode for toddlers up to 3 years and time-boxed mode for the older kids (kindergarten age), - High Definition (HD) graphics for your Android phones and tablets, - Free, Ads support development of future updates and new games for kids. Includes pictures and sounds of the following animals: * Cat, * Cow, * Dog, * Donkey, * Duck, * Goat, * Horse, * Pig, * Rabbit, * Rooster, * Sheep, * Turkey.

description: This App creates interactive charts and facilitates Technical Analysis of stock charts. Its strength is a user interface with ‘touch’ friendly commands to draw Trend Lines, Support Lines, and Retracement Lines over stock charts. Its set of indicators also generates Buy and Sell signals over charts. The profitability of these signals is tracked individually on a Trade screen and a comparison of the relative profitability of all indicators over the time frame is also calculated. Common Price Patterns are identified. This App helps you learn about the stock you want to trade (with NO Advertising). PLEASE NOTE: 1. Data is downloaded from Yahoo Finance and quotes are 15 min. delayed approx 2. Yahoo Finance historical data is 1-2 days out of date for certain Asian Exchanges Chart Lists and Individual Charts: - Charts can be viewed as part of watch lists, or individually by symbol - Create one or more watch lists. The App saves each list for future use - Add stock symbols to each list. Trading details can optionally be entered for each symbol - View current stock price data for each symbol in a list - Tap a symbol in the selected List to view current stock data in chart format - Save charts for later review while not connected to the internet Saved Charts: - View any chart previously saved. Viewing charts can be done while not connected to the internet - Delete individual charts or all charts to manage storage Features: - Access detailed Help for each screen - View training videos on You Tube: - http://youtu.be/3weArYctcZQ (demo without lists) - http://youtu.be/YEEpK1C9WGM (demo with lists) - The App is installed with Default values for various options. The Settings Menu enables changes to options. - Select the type of data and the date range. The type of data can be Daily, Weekly, or Monthly. The date range can vary from 3 months of Daily data to 20 years of Monthly data - Set the chart type to Candlesticks, High-Low-Close (HLC) bars, or a Solid Line - Parameters can be modified - Indicators include Volume, OBV, Volume A/D, Rate of Change, Stochastics, RSI, MACD, Follow Through Day, Relative High and Low, SMA (single, double, and triple crossover), Bollinger Bands, and Price Channels - Tap a list to view current prices for all symbols in the list. It shows the gain or loss for a position if Buy Price was entered for a symbol. Then, tap a symbol in the list to view its chart - A symbol's trading details (if any) are also shown. Trading details may include purchase date, position (number shares), buy price, target and stop -The profitability of Buy and Sell signals generated by indicators are tracked individually on a Trades screen and a comparison of the relative profitability of all indicators over the time frame is also calculated Charts: - Zoom in the right half of the chart - Zoom out to view all data - Define a zoom range on the chart by tapping, holding, and moving two fingers - Tap anywhere over the right price axis to see a horizontal price line on the chart - Tap anywhere over the price bars to see a price box on the chart. The price box for a price bar shows the Date, Open, High, Low, Close and Volume - The Chart Type (Candlestick/HLC Bars/Solid line) and the type and date range of price bars can be changed using menu settings - ’Finger Swipe’ the Indicators section of the chart to cycle through the available indicators. Indicators can be customized using menu settings - Add trend-lines to the chart. A trend-line can be added with one or two fingers - Add support lines. - Add Retracement lines. - Send Chart in Email with a screen-shot attachment - Save Chart for Offline for later review - Go Back or Go Forward through the charts of symbols in a list - Enter symbol to view its chart Trade Charts: - Planned for a future release. keywords: stock, stocks, stock market, quotes, candlestick, technical analysis, chart, portfolio, trend line, support, retracement, trading, back-testing, price patterns
release_text: EE Stock Charts V19 Update: - Fix to prevent crash due to recent data format change

description: Radar Alive! brings weather radar to your phone or tablet from all US states and Puerto Rico. Watch tornadoes, hurricanes and other weather events live and in Level III detail. Monitor your local weather radar. See warnings on the map, and warning text. Track storm chasers and report your own position through Spotter Network. Easily switch to the nearest doppler radar with a long press on the map. See weather observations on the METAR layer. Radar Alive! is suitable for storm chasers, professional meteorologists, emergency personnel, SKYWARN spotters and weather enthusiasts. It has a wide selection of US radar products (image types). NWS severe weather warnings are displayed along with a customizable low clutter map with cities, roads, counties and states. The display is suitable for both phones and tablets. Choose from a complete menu of radar products at multiple tilt angles, including composite and base reflectivity, base and storm relative velocity, VIL, hydrometeor classification (type of precipitation) and others. Spot tornadoes with the velocity and base reflectivity plots; view warning boxes and warning text; watch hail with the hydrometeor classification display. Radar Alive!'s precision images are generated from NOAA's NEXRAD Level III binary data (NWS weather radar). Carefully simplified maps minimize clutter on the radar display. With an AllisonHouse subscription, you get an alternate source of radar data, along with new products including lightning, watches, local storm reports, and SPC Day 1 convective outlook The serious user will appreciate advanced features, such as smart GPS usage to conserve battery power; network bandwidth conservation; and, maps optimized for weather radars. A full Spotter Network client is included. It can display the positions of active Spotter Network users. You can use it to automatically report your position to Spotter Network, and to make reports of weather events. When the main app is not in use, it can run in the background, where it can be controlled from an icon in the notification bar of the device. Radar Alive! was written by a veteran storm chaser for the serious meteorological user. Extensive help is available within the app. If you experience problems, or to learn how to best use Radar Alive Pro, use the menu button to select the help pages or ask for advice or support on the supplied form. Support is also available by email, and suggestions are welcome. More information is available at the developer's web site at http://www.radaralive.com/ ">developer's web site.
release_text: Version 4.011 - Bug fixes and improvements. Now optionally keeps centered on GPS location. Added menu button, removed zoom +- buttons. See the release notes in the app for more details. PLEASE REPORT ANY PROBLEMS! They will be addressed quickly. Please use built-in support form in the app if possible, web site if not.

description: Back to Bed is a 3D puzzle Indie game set in a unique, beautiful and artistic dream world, wherein you guide the sleepwalker Bob to the safety of his bed. To achieve this, you must take control of Bob’s subconscious guardian named Subob. The pair travels through a surreal and painting-like dreamscapes, filled with objects used to guide Bob towards the Bed, but also dangers that must be avoided! No ads and no in-app purchases. ========= “Back to Bed manages to simultaneously be predictable and surprising, sleepy and lively, scary and comforting—just like any good piece of Surrealist art.” - Killscreen “Back to Bed is what happens when you let Dali, Escher, and Magritte develop a game.” - PowerUpGaming.co.uk “What you see isn’t always what it seems, and the moments that use these ploys are some of the best Back to Bed has to offer. It’s mindbending and an utter delight.” - Twinfinite ========= Awards & Nominations: - IGF Student Showcase Winner 2013 - Dutch Game Awards 2012: Guts & Glory Indie Award - Unity Awards 2012: Best Student Project - Nominee - Nordic Game Indie Night 2012: Finalist - Casual Connect Europe 2014: Best Console - Nominee ========= Features: • Unique surreal and artistic game universe: A strange but beautiful dream universe that mixes elements from the real world and the world of dreams to create something unique, surreal and sometimes a bit scary. • Isometric puzzle levels: Navigate detailed 3D puzzles that defy the laws of physics, wherein the player must manipulate the strange environment to create a safe path Bob and avoid the dangers of the puzzle. • Two characters as one: Play as the embodied subconsciousness, in the form of a small guardian creature, trying to save its own sleepwalking body from dangers of the dream world. • Picturesque visual style: Discover the feeling of playing in a piece of art set in a digital frame. A visual style inspired by hand-painted techniques, surreal art and impossible shapes. • Nightmare mode: Unlock a more challenging version of the game, made for those who truly want to test their puzzle solving skills and enjoy thinking many steps ahead, or who are just too stubborn to give up. • MOGA-support: Enjoy Back to Bed with MOGA controllers. “Now featured on NVIDIA TegraZone. Plays great with full controller support on NVIDIA SHIELD Portable and SHIELD Tablet, and Android TV.” ========= Keep up with Back to Bed at www.facebook.com/Backtobedthegame Privacy Policy: Back to Bed sends automated bug reports, device information, gameplay and location data. The information sent does not include personal or private information nor can it be used to reveal the identity of a player. The purpose of the data is to discover bugs and improve the experience of Back to Bed on the most common devices. All information is strictly for internal use and will not be provided to any third party.
release_text: The following languages are now available in Back to Bed: - English - German - French - Spanish - Italian - Portuguese (Brazilian) - Russian - Japanese - Chinese (Traditional) - Chinese (Simplified) *Android TV controller support

description: *“Smelly cat, smelly cat, you are no friend to those with noses”, haha！* Dear little friends, do you still feel annoyed by your naughty pet who keeps getting himself dirty? Here we offer you the real solution, come to try our newly opened Pet Beauty Salon! You can’t agree more that your little peanut is a natural trouble maker, who is crazy about making a mess of himself. See, kitty Vickie just returned from candy land still with some sweets on her body. And no kidding! Is that our doggy Jackie? He should never be allowed to join the Scout Camp, from where he came back as a mud doll. Believe or not, the naughty animals won’t stop there. You won’t let them be like this, right? Come and take time to give them a shower. Even the animals become not that dirty after shower, they won’t be cute enough until you give them a makeover. It is really necessary to award them some beauty treatments and help them get dressed. “Tick tock, tick tick.” Wow, activity time! Going for a picnic is not bad, what do you say? Actually, those are just the tip of the iceberg of what we offered. For more details, please come with your love and see by yourself . How to play: Open the game and choose an animal to start. At first, you have to help him take a shower. He may become clean and tidy as you go through the clean-up challenges, which involve the anti-bacteria and the removal of bugs from the ears. Ah, have you ever seen singing bubbles? Bingo, that’s what we’ve got. Trust me, you can’t stop taping when you see them. Now do you have enough fun? Nope? Don’t worry, click the arrow to continue. Here, your little furry friend can enjoy an excellent spa as well as the exclusive mask made by you. We also offer your love various exquisite clothing, so you’ll never bother to clothe him any more. Hoo, after working so hard to deal with your sweetie why not hang out with him for a while? Choose an activity and enjoy a super fun day. Anyway, your naughty peanut feels really good here. He’s begging you for another chance: “master, please!” Features: - 6 adorable pets to choose - 10 customized clean-up challenges & 7 beauty treatments to DIY - 6 fabulous mini games & 3 amazing showing rooms - Various exquisite clothing for free combination - Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions. Need You Know: This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

A simple yet fast and simple way to check the value of your Bitcoin investments. This app helps you to keep watch on Bitcoin exchange rates, its statistics and value for various currencies. It provides useful up-to-date statistics about the Bitcoin currency, and allows you to always know what your Bitcoins are worth, even when you're on the go. This app displays the real-time Bitcoin (BTC) exchange rates for various currencies with: ⁃ 15 minutes market price ⁃ 24 hour average market price ⁃ Last, Buy and Sell price Features Includes : • Updates on exchange rates across various currencies • Bitcoin currency statistics with Market Summary, Mining Cost, Hash Rate and Electricity Consumption • Currency _Converter • Activity Chart • User friendly interface • Universal App Disclaimer : We do not assume responsibility for the accuracy of the data presented in this app. The data is gathered from public apis and should not be used as a basis for financial. Application developer disclaims any responsibility for any decision taken based on these values.

description: Free fully functional 3 day trial Also available for PC! http://dvasive.com/wp/pc-2/ Stop apps from spying on you! Alerts when your Camera, Mic, Bluetooth and WiFi are activated and lets you lock them. The 1st Antispy App that gives you complete control! In this day and age privacy is a big concern. There are many invasive apps out there that discretely collect your personal information as well as track your location, record your conversations and even video record you. D-Vasive Pro is the 1st Anti spy App that will help protect your privacy from these invasive apps by alerting you if an application is trying to spy on you, using your phone's Camera, Microphone, Bluetooth or WiFi connections and gives you the ability to lock them. D-Vasive Pro also lists running and installed apps that have access to tracking your location. Stingray Shield    • What it is: Stingray Shield is a layer of protection for your mobile device, making it impossible for Stingray or Kingfish trackers to intercept and steal your mobile data.    • What it does: Completely secures all mobile data and all mobile connections by shutting down various onboard transmitters and receivers, while still permitting use of other functions. D-Vasive Pro is not your typical Anti-Spyware. The typical anti-spyware relies on a database of known definitions and then scans every single file on your phone to compare with. This does not offer real protection as there are viruses and spyware being created everyday. So, a recently made virus or spyware will be unknown to the database, bypassing your typical anti-spyware software and able to access your system. D-Vasive Pro offers a layer of protection that is in your control and is very reliable. D-Vasive Pro operates in a unique way, allowing you complete control in managing your mobile devices internal hardware. So that way, when a potential malicious app tries to open your Camera, Mic, Bluetooth or WiFi and spy on you, D-Vasive Pro lets you know, and lets you completely lock them down. COMPLETE WALKTHROUGH: http://youtu.be/WAkQyh4QnXM D-VASIVE PRO D-Vasive Pro offers additional features to completely secure your privacy:    • Secure Camera    • Secure Microphone    • Secure Bluetooth    • Secure WiFi    • Pause detection alerts    • Increased amount of logs    • Precise dial control    • Silent alert mode Once you run D-Vasive Pro on your device it is already working and protecting your privacy. You can then customize which alerts you want to receive and set how often D-Vasive Pro should check to see if your internal hardware is in use. When you exit or close D-Vasive Pro you are still protected as it will be working in the background. D-Vasive is a powerful App used to protect your privacy. It is not advisable to run D-Vasive with all internal devices locked down for more than 4 hours, while running other apps. Your battery life will be drained of course. Only use lock down while conducting private affairs. For more information check out our website: http://dvasive.com RATED 4.5  ★★★★☆  Android Headlines http://www.androidheadlines.com/2014/08/sponsored-app-review-d-vasive-anti-spy-pro.html Stay up to date with news on the latest features and updates    • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100006070997502    • Twitter: https://twitter.com/DVasive See Our New PC Version! http://dvasive.com/wp/pc-2/

description: Tootooni! Games for Toddlers & Kids Twenty children's games in one, to educate and entertain toddlers and small children. The games feature cute, colorful cartoon art and lively sound effects. The user interface is specially designed to allow kids to explore and enjoy the games on their own. Draw the tracks game: Kids, drag your finger on the screen to create a train track, road or airway over the on-screen scenery, then watch as the cartoon trains, cars and airplanes travel along the paths while making their distinctive sounds. Building blocks game: Kids, pick up and place different shapes and colors of blocks and form houses, trains, etc with or without gravity. Match the pairs game: Kids, tap the screen to reveal pictures of the cartoon vehicle characters and exercise your memory by matching the pairs of identical pictures (of trains, cars, planes). Water paint game: Kids, brush your finger over the black-and-white sketches to reveal the colors that complete the picture. Finger paint game: Kids, choose colors from the palette and brush your finger over the canvas to color-in the black-and-white sketches using your own imagination. Picture puzzle game: Kids, reassemble the scrambled pictures by dragging the tiles to their correct place on the canvas. Music room : Tap on the cartoon characters and hear the sounds they make (trains, cars, planes). Connect the dots game: Kids, tap on the numbered dots in sequence to reveal the hidden image. Scratch the cards game: Kids, scratch with your finger the card to unveil the picture. Blackboard: Kids, write your name, letters, numbers, outlines, do additions using your finger as chalk on the blackboard. Maze game: Kids, drag the character (train, car, airplane) and solve the maze. Math game: Kids, count the characters (train, car, airplane) and/or add, subtract, multiply, divide numbers. My Puzzle, My Scratch, My Water paint game: Kids, add your drawings, digital photos, web downloaded images of favorite cartoon characters and play in these games. Reversi: a strategy board game for one player vs computer or two players. Four in a Row: a strategy board game to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before your opponent. Blocks 2: Build the same structure as the one depicted on the card placed at the top left corner of the screen. Tic Tac Toe: a classic game loved by children. Slide puzzle: slide the scrambled piece to their correct place on the canvas. Toddler lock: Use the toddler lock button in the starting menu to keep your kids in the app. Toddler lock functionality does not change any of your device's settings and may not work on all devices. To unlock, use your device's back button to go to the starting menu and tap on unlock. Suitable for 1 year, 2 years, 3 years, 4 year, 5 year, 6 years + old. Privacy : No data of any kind is collected by this app. This app does not make use of internet communications. Planarsoft educational games for toddler, baby, preschool, kindergarten, child, children, kids, with train characters, trains, cars, planes featuring games like water paint, finger paint, puzzle (jigsaw), drawing tracks & lines, scratch, connect the dots, memory, music. Special thanks to Thomas & Alex.
release_text: 5.8 [8 Dec 2014] Five new games 5.7 [21 Sep 2014] New in game grouping button 5.5 [1 Aug 2014] Added more options in some games 5.0 [12 Apr 2014] Toddler lock 3.6 [22 May 2013] 2 new games Maze & Math, take screenshots (enable in Options), 3 new games Puzzle, Water paint, Scratch to add your own photos, kid's drawings, web downloaded images, Bug fixes 3.0 [15 Nov 2012] New physics game : Building blocks! New all in one menu to choose game easily!

description: Все, наверно, знают игру со словами, в которой из одного слова надо получить другое путём замены на каждом шаге ровно одной буквы. Эта игра называется метаграмма. Целью является последовательным изменением по одной букве, перейти от одного загаданного слова к другому в заданное число шагов. Также эта игра известна под названием цепочка слов. В ней имея начальное слово, например, муха, необходимо осуществить невероятное превращение этого животного в... слона! И всё это меняя по одной букве в слове. При этом новое слово должно действительно существовать. В качестве примера цепочки слов и её решения можно привести рыбную цепочку слов, где из КИТа получается СОМ. Берём слово КИТ заменяем в нём одну букву и получаем КОТ дальше из кота получается КОМ а уже из кома как раз нужный нам СОМ Выглядит просто, но стоит попробовать самому, как вы увидите, что это обманчивая простота. Разработано DeBIA. All probably know the game with the words in which one word is necessary to get another by replacing at each step exactly one letter. This game is called Metagrams. The aim is gradual change one letter, to move from one to another of the hidden word in the specified number of steps. Also, this game is known as the chain of words. In her initial word of having, for example, a fly, you need to implement an incredible transformation in this animal ... elephant! And all this by changing one letter in the word. With this new word should really exist. As an example, strings of words and its solutions can cause fish chain of words, where China gets from COM. Take the word KIT replace it in a letter and get CAT more of a cat turns COM and already from a coma just want us to COM Looks simple, but worth a try yourself, as you will see that this deceptive simplicity. Developed DeBIA.

***Cute Kitten and Puppy Sounds*** If you love cute kittens and puppies this is the app for you! A Fun, Free and colorful SoundBoard for Kitten and Puppy lovers. Adorable breeds of kittens and puppies all with there unique barks and meows and HD pictures. Great fun for boys and girls alike with it's easy to use interface. * 12 different adorable Kittens * 12 different cute puppies Its also great fun to try and trick your cat or dog into thinking there is another cat or dog with them in the room. Press the different buttons and watch them hunt around trying to find the Kitten and Puppy to play with! This app is a full app that is completely free!! **REVIEWS** A big thank you to everyone who has reviewed our games :-) Here are a few reviews from our awesome customers! ☆☆☆☆☆ - "Cutest game - Cute pictures & sounds game using kittens and puppies. Children will enjoy playing and sharing there new found pets with family and friends :) ☆☆☆☆☆ - "Cute kitten and puppy It is awesome I can make cat and dog rap" - Geneva Durgan ☆☆☆☆☆ - "Awesome!! It makes my dogs go crazy to here cats!" - Gloria Lucero If you enjoy this app please check out; Cute Kitten Match - Memory app Now available on Google Play for free!

We believe that the Jamaican Patois language is beautiful and we want to help non-Jamaican learn it one word at a time. It's super simple and easy to use. We're constantly adding new words and improving the Patois(Patwa) translations. Note: Jamaican Patois is not the official language of Jamaica. Therefore, some words will have any Jamaican Translation. Please send us your comments, questions or feature request.

description: An unofficial NewsBlur extension for the News+ RSS reading app. This app acts as a plugin to the popular News+ app, and allows you to use your NewsBlur account for RSS reading right inside your Android device. Read using your phone, tablet, or with the excellent official web application - and always stay in complete sync. Note: You must have a premium NewsBlur account in order to use this extension, due to limitations in the NewsBlur API. Also, this project is open source and can be found on https://github.com/asafge/NewsBlurPlus . Tags: RSS, News+, NewsBlur, gReader
release_text: Note: If you're experiencing sync issues after the latest upgrade, please try logging out and back into NewsBlur+. If you're still experiencing issues - please email me! * Fixed an issue where stories from unsubscribed feeds were still synced. * Enabled SSL (HTTPS) for all API calls to the NewsBlur server.

description: Trova Bed & Breakfast. Utilizzando il nostro motore di ricerca, otterrete i risultati delle attività che si trovano più vicine a voi. Avrete la possibilità di conoscere quali sono i Bed & Breakfast che si trovano in zona, con la loro distanza dalla vostra posizione, il loro indirizzo esatto ed inoltre premendo sul tasto più, potrete scegliere se telefonare al B&B o inserire in automatico come destinazione del vostro navigatore il Bed&Breakfast di vostro interesse.
release_text: Inserita la modalità di ricerca manuale in caso di mancata localizzazione della posizione

description: Dashclock Updates Extension is an extension for the Dashclock Widget that displays information about your device's possible upcoming application updates. This extension is free to use when used alone but when used simultaneously with other extensions made by this developer, a small one-time purchase is required to unlock them all. This application is entirely open-source. If you'd like to have new features or additional languages/locales please raise an issue ticket at https://github.com/mridang/dashclock-updates . This extension requires the requires the Dashclock Widget by Roman Nurik: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock

ColEm is a ColecoVision emulator. It runs Coleco games on your Android phone or tablet. Play Coleco games with Bluetooth joysticks, Xperia gaming buttons, Moga gamepad, or iCade joystick. Save game play at any time and restart once you get killed. Record ColecoVision music to MIDI files and use them as ringtones. Play with friends over WiFi or Internet, using NetPlay. * Optimized for Android devices using assembler and 3D hardware, and running Coleco games at the fastest possible speed. * Full screen portrait or landscape mode emulation, with options for simulating TV scanlines and fuzzy TV display. * Emulates joystick using touch screen, Bluetooth gamepads, Xperia gaming buttons, Moga gamepad, iCade joystick, physical keyboard, or accelerometer. ColEm Deluxe is the full, premium ColEm version. In includes better joystick support, network play, and the ability to share your saved game play with other users. ColEm package itself does not contain any games. You should place your own game files onto the SD card before running ColEm. Please, do not run any software you do not own with ColEm. The author cannot and will not tell you where to find free Coleco games. Report any encountered problems here: http://groups.google.com/group/emul8
release_text: * Added second player, if you have two gamepads connected. * To play together, connect both gamepads before starting ColEm. * Added virtual keypad control from any gamepad. * Added Material Design icons everywhere. * Retouched virtual gamepad images.

description: “Animal Cards” is a free educational game for children between 1 and 5 years of age. It helps your child learn about 108 kinds of animals in an enjoyable way. Each animals has its own picture, text name and voice name. And you can record your own voice for the animals. After the child has looked through all the flashcards, he or she can take a fun quiz to see how many of the animals he or she knows. Besides English,this app also supports the Spanish, Polish,German,Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese languages. "Animal Cards" have 2 little games. 1. Give the animals voice name, touch the right picture. 2. Give the animals noise, touch the right picture. Features: - HD Flash cards. - Auto slide show the flash cards. - Record your own voice for the animals. - Favorite the Flash cards. - Support Lower case and Upper case for animals name. - Two little games. Wishes your baby enjoy the "Animal Cards".
release_text: Whole new UI design. Add record the voice for the animal cards Add the list of animals. Add little game for animals. Fixed sometimes back key can not exit the game.

description: Secure Parental Control is dedicated to supporting parents in their day to day life and keeping children safe. Our Parental Control Phone Finder app is meant for parents who want to find their missing children by a simple SMS text message. Our “Parental Control Phone Finder” app allows parents to locate their kids just by sending them an SMS text message. Children and teens have a natural urge to wonder around and explore. We help parents to monitor, supervise, locate or to provide guidance to their children and teens in their activities and day-to-day lives. Parents have a natural desire to ensure the safety of their children and we want to help. Our child locator app provides parents with the Peace of Mind they are looking for without any monthly recurring costs or subscriptions. Take your mobile phone and just send an SMS text message to the mobile phone of your kid. His or her location will be reported right back to you! That is technology for you. IMPORTANT: The "Parental Control Phone Finder" app needs to be installed on the Android mobile phone of your kid! An icon to open the settings screen will be displayed so the app will be completely visible to your kid. As a parent you can keep an eye on your children, but the children remain in full control and always have the power to turn the GPS on or off. Parents will get notified when that happens, so this issue can be addressed when needed. To remotely find the children placed under your supervision, send them an SMS text message with FIND and their first name. With our "Parental Control Phone Finder" app you will learn about the location of the mobile phone of your children when you feel that is urgently needed. Receive a fresh SMS text message with the updated location of your loved ones when requested. Your child will get a notification message to inform him. Just remotely turn the Parental Control Phone Finder on once by sending it an SMS text message and receive a reply message with the latest location to keep a close eye.
release_text: Added notification to inform the user when the app is being used.

description: Лучшее приложение для изучения французского! Самый лучший французский разговорник. Поможет вам: 1. Запомнить набор полезных фраз и выражений 2. Поставить французское произношение Предназначено для начинающих изучать французский язык. Вы можете прослушивать как фразы, так и слова, из которых они состоят, просто прикасаясь к тексту пальцами. Это позволяет сначала научиться произносить отдельные слова, а затем всю фразу целиком. Все тексты озвучены носителями языка. Программа содержит в себе следующие темы с наиболее употребляемыми французскими фразами: 1. Основные фразы 2. Приветствия 3. Общие разговорные фразы 4. Вежливость 5. Знакомство 6. Приглашение 7. Хобби 8. Настроение и чувства 9. Числа 10. Время 11. Дни и даты 12. Погода 13. Путешествие на самолёте 14. Багаж 15. Паспортный контроль и таможня 16. Путешествие на поезде 17. Поездка на автобусе 18. Поездка на такси 19. Поездка на машине 20. Метро 21. Направления 22. В гостинице 23. Деньги и банк 24. В ресторане 25. Покупки 26. Осмотр достопримечательностей 27. Музеи и художественные галереи 28. В театре 29. В кино 30. В ночном клубе 31. У парикмахера 32. У врача 33. В аптеке 34. У стоматолога 35. Чрезвычайные обстоятельства 36. Работа 37. Собеседование 38. В офисе 39. По телефону 40. Факс 41. Интернет Первые 6 тем бесплатные. Все фразы переведены на русский язык. К каждому слову прилагается краткая словарная статья. Управлять текстом можно как с помощью жестов, так и с помощью кнопок, расположенных под текстом. Программа поддерживает следующие жесты: 1. Чтобы выбрать и прослушать слово, прикоснитесь к нему пальцем. 2. Чтобы перейти к следующему или предыдущему слову, проведите по тексту пальцем вправо или влево. 3. Чтобы выбрать и прослушать фразу, прикоснитесь к ней дважды одним пальцем. 4. Чтобы прослушать фразу повторно, прикоснитесь к тексту двумя пальцами. 5. Чтобы перейти к следующей или предыдущей фразе, проведите по тексту двумя пальцами вправо или влево. 6. Чтобы проиграть текст до конца с выбранного места, прикоснитесь к тексту тремя пальцами или дважды двумя пальцами. 7. Чтобы остановить проигрывание, прикоснитесь к тексту двумя или более пальцами. 8. Если у вас смартфон, вы можете изменять размер окна с переводом, проводя по тексту двумя пальцами вверх или вниз. Насладитесь изучением французского с помощью нашей программы! Best app to learn French! The best French phrase book. It will help you: 1. Remember a set of useful phrases and expressions 2. Put the French pronunciation Designed for beginners to learn the French language. You can listen to both phrases and words from which they are made by simply touching the text with your fingers. This allows you to first learn how to pronounce certain words, and then the entire phrase. All texts by native speakers. The program contains the following topics with the most used French phrases: 1. Basic phrases 2. Cheers 3. Common conversational phrases 4. Courtesy 5. Familiarity 6. Invitation 7. Hobby 8. The mood and feelings 9. Numbers 10. Time 11. The days and dates 12. Weather 13. Traveling by plane 14. Luggage 15. Passport control and customs 16. Traveling by train 17. The bus ride 18. A taxi ride 19. A trip by car 20. Metro 21. Directions 22. The hotel 23. Cash and bank 24. The restaurant 25. Shopping 26. Sightseeing 27. Museums and art galleries 28. In the theater 29. At the movies 30. In a nightclub 31. At the hairdresser 32. At the doctor 33. The pharmacy 34. At the dentist 35. Extraordinary circumstances 36. Work 37. Interview 38. In the office 39. On the phone 40. Fax 41. Internet The first 6 so free. All phrases translated into the Russian language. Each word comes with a brief dictionary entry. Control the text as you can with the help of gestures, and with the help of the buttons below the text. The program supports the following gestures: 1. To select and listen to the word, tap it with your finger. 2. To move to the next or previous word, swipe your finger on the text to the right or to the left. 3. To select and listen to the phrase, tap on it twice with one finger. 4. To hear the sentence again, touch the text with two fingers. 5. To move to the next or previous sentence, share text with two fingers left or right. 6. To play until the end of the text from the selected point, tap the text of the three-finger or two fingers twice. 7. To stop the playback, touch the text of two or more fingers. 8. If you have a smartphone, you can change the size of the transfer window, spending on the text with two fingers up or down. Enjoy the study of French with the help of our program!

Magic Jigsaw Puzzles is a constantly updated collection of original puzzles for the true lovers of brainstorming! Colorful themed pictures, new opportunities and pleasant music will help you to forget about everyday worries and will bring a fascinating pastime. Just enjoy: - More than 5000 beautiful, high-definition jigsaw puzzles - feel free to explore and play it all! - Constantly updated pictures gallery and new free puzzle every day! - 4 levels of difficulty (up to 280 pieces): start as a beginner and become a master! - Create your own jigsaw puzzles from your pictures! - Work on more than one puzzle at a time and see your progress! - Big choice of backgrounds! - Save completed jigsaw puzzles in your photo album and share them with your friends! - Easy-to-operate control! - Easy preview. Feel free to share your opinion with us by sending a message to contact@bandagames.com . We will be excited to hear from you! Please, note that the app is free but contains in-app purchases.
